name: Symble
summary: A code-cracking logic game, where players must guess a secret five letter word. Each guess reveals a set of three mystery symbols, and players must use their guesses to determine what each symbol represents in order to decode the secret word.

name: Synth Riders: Infected Mushroom - "I Wish"
summary: Add Infected Mushroom - "I Wish" to your library!

name: Synth Riders: Zardonic - "Blue Monday (Synth Riders version)"
summary: “Blue Monday” - ZardonicThis classic from electronic music pioneers New Order is given Zardonic's signature heavy EDM treatment, with rocking drums & guitar, blended with EDM & lashings of retro synths over REEBZ' vocals. Made for Synth Riders, expect a heavy new twist on an old favorite.

name: Synergia
summary: Synergia is a yuri thriller visual novel that takes place in a cyberpunk future, wrapped up in a beautifully unique, vibrant neon aesthetic. At the end of the world, sometimes love is the ultimate crime.

name: System Reject
summary: System Reject is an exciting sci-fi role-playing game set in an underground laboratory overrun by zombies and robots. Explore and fight for survival with limited resources. Customize weapons, upgrade skills, and engage in intense combat.

name: Sydney's World
summary: Sydney's World is a family-friendly JRPG. Game focus is on the intersecting story arcs of a young girl seeking her father and a king in search of redemption.

name: Synth Riders: Infected Mushroom - "Black Velvet" (feat. Ninet Tayeb)
summary: Add Infected Mushroom - "Black Velvet" (feat. Ninet Tayeb)" to your library!

name: Symphoni
summary: A virtual reality rhythm game where you can be a grand musical wizard who breathes new life into classical music.

name: Syndicate Plus
summary:
Syndicate is Bullfrog’s masterpiece of a game in which you aren’t saving the world or protecting innocents. You just make sure that your employers get what they want. At your disposal are four cyborg agents, an impressive arsenal of weapons and gadgets, and a massive selection of cybernetic upgrades. You are free to unleash this power on a highly interactive map where you can blow up buildings, steal cars, light trees on fire, or just shoot stuff. Produced by Peter Molyneux himself, Syndicate is the essence of cyberpunk and, with its great music, stylized visuals, and mind-blowing atmosphere, it has earned its place among the best games of all time.

The "Plus" release includes both the original base game and the American Revolt expansion pack.

name: Syd of Valis
summary: Wait a minute! When did Valis become so cutesy?!

name: Sympathy Kiss
summary: Sympathy Kiss is an otome game by Otomate that involves the heroine who was working for almost a year at an app development company and was used to the usual mediocrity of work. However, she is suddenly reassigned to the production department of an app that is about to end its service. She has to choose the ideal partner that will keep the app alive for years to come. Just what awaits her–?!

name: Symphonic Rain
summary: Set in Piova, the city of music and endless rain. Guide Chris Vertin on the path to become a master musician in a harmonious fusion of Visual Novel and Music-based gameplay.

name: System Clues
summary: Play as a secret agent of a mysterious organization and complete complex plot investigation tasks through network infiltration, social engineering, and digital investigation. Is it justice or sin?

name: System Shock: Rewired
summary: System Shock: Rewired is the very first full fan made singleplayer campaign for the original System Shock in over 24 years! 3 brand new levels with branching paths, 4 new cyberspace sections, new puzzles, brand new soundtrack by SpeedySPCFan, new fully voiced audiologs, new on-screen text and so much more awaits in the now dark corridors of the hospital ship UNN Bismarck. Playable with all existing versions of System Shock (Enhanced Edition recommended). What are you waiting for? SHODAN waits for your return! And she is eager to end your - in her opinion - useless existence.

name: Synth Riders
summary: Synth Riders is available now for Nintendo Switch, featuring entirely new mechanics, a campaign story mode, and 4-player local multiplayer. This version is reimagined for the Switch's handheld and TV modes, offering a cyberpunk rhythm experience with a soundtrack from artists like Lady Gaga, Queen, Sia, and Jack Harlow.

name: Synthwave Tunnel
summary: Take a late-night ride in Synthwave Tunnel! Race through neon-lit, rhythm-generated paths, pushing your reflexes to the limit. Speed through dynamic obstacles, synced to the beat, and conquer the ultimate challenge. Can you reach the end?

name: Synthwave Dream '85
summary: Neons, extreme speed, drifting, arcade scoreboard: everything an '80s stereotypes lover needs

name: SynthetiCell BioClicker
summary: SynthetiCell BioClicker is an Idle incremental simulator where you bring to life a colony of synthetic automaton cells. Inspired by the classic 'Game of Life' by mathematician John Horton Conway (1970) about the evolution of an organism. Can you guide your colony to prosperity?

name: Synthesis: Mind, Body and Soul
summary: Synthesis is a hack n’ slash adventure with a twist, you don’t have a body! Swap between foes to maintain your health and gain valuable abilities that will aid in you in your quest.

name: Syberia 3: The Complete Journey
summary: The limitless imagination of Benoît Sokal continues in Syberia 3, focusing on an entirely new adventure. After abandoning the island, Kate is found dying on the edge of a river by the Youkole tribe, a nomadic people migrating with their snow ostriches. Stuck in Valsembor village, together they must find a way to continue their journey in a race against their enemies and unexpected obstacles, not to mention Kate's past, which catches up with her.

name: System Under Surveillance
summary: System Under Surveillance (SUS) is an upcoming stealth indie game with adventure and puzzle elements inspired by classic retro games. Take control of Adam and Turbo, and use their vastly different abilities to trick and avoid enemies. SUS is pure stealth at its core, and has no combat system!

name: Syzygy
summary: A dialog-only interactive fiction game where you play the role of Diplomat Calliope, charged with maintaining good relations with the planet Syzygy.

name: Synthetic Blood: Mind Shift
summary: Synthetic Blood: Mind Shift is a futuristic action-platformer with a deep storyline and fascinating binding of mechanics of death and dialogs. Dynamic combat system, interesting characters and 10 different endings will not leave you cold.

name: Symphonic Rain
summary: Symphonic Rain, The reborn HD edition, Remastered by Siro! Set in Piova, the city of music and endless rain. Guide Chris Vertin on the path to become a master musician in a harmonious fusion of Visual Novel and Music-based gameplay.

It features 32 countries represented in 12 events: 100M Sprint, 110M Hurdles, Hammer, Javelin, Triple Jump, High Jump, 100M Freestyle Swimming, Olympic Sprint Cycling, Skeet Shooting, Super Heavyweight Weight Lifting, 10M Platform Diving and Kayak K1 Slalom.

name: Sylviana: Ai Ippai no Boukensha

Despite everything Sylviana tried, her mother's condition only got worse. Then one day, she heard a rumor about a Dr. Doppler, who can create a medicine that will cure any disease. She decides to head out and find this Dr. Doppler, and convince him to give her the medicine. However, she soon finds out that the doctor is unable to help her, due to having had his eight treasures stolen from him by demons. Sylviana vows to return the treasures to him in exchange for the medicine.

name: Syringe

name: Synth Riders: The Presidents of the United States of America - "Lump"
Syphon Filter 3
summary: Syphon Filter 3 is a third-person shooter developed by Bend Studio and published by Sony Computer Entertainment. Released in November 2001 for the PlayStation, it is the third instalment in the Syphon Filter series. The game continues the story of secret agents Gabe Logan and Lian Xing as they are interrogated by a Senate committee about their previous missions. The narrative unfolds through flashbacks, revealing their battles against international conspiracies and bioterrorism.

name: Synthwave Driver
summary: A nostalgic road trip on an endless highway, driving iconic '80s cars through a neon-filled paradise. Let the synthwave soundtrack guide you toward the horizon, leading you into a world of nostalgic vibes.

name: Symphony
summary:
Your music is under attack… You must liberate it! 
In Symphony, you fight through levels uniquely generated by your own song collection, discover items and vanquish bosses to defeat the evil within! 
 
 
 
With Symphony, we wanted to push the limits of user-music-based gameplay and focused on two concepts: 
 
Your music creates the game 
Every song has a unique emotion, sound and rhythm, and we wanted the gameplay to capture that as fully as possible. When your music gets intense or calmer, so does the gameplay. Enemies appear and shoot on the beat of the music. Some weapons are music-driven. Each song has its personality and it directly translates into gameplay. 
 
Replayability 
In Symphony, each song in your collection not only becomes a unique level, but also provides you with an item you can equip and challenges you with score targets to reach. As you progress through the game, you unlock new difficulty levels, new items and abilities! This means you have many reasons to play your favorite song over and over.

name: Symphony Of Motion
summary: Symphony Of Motion offers a new unique way to create and experience music without the need for any prior musical knowledge. Whether you're a seasoned musician or a complete beginner, this is a new and intuitive way to create and experience music. In its simplest form, you just move your hands around to create unique sounds, melodies, and rhythms. There are no “wrong” notes to worry about (as you always play in a specific scale) and you can always stay on perfect tempo with the build-in perfect timing assistant. For the more experienced musicians, it also offers a lot of customization options, a build-in looper, and new levels of expressional depth with its three-dimensional motion modulation, live pitch-shifting drums, and melodic pads.

name: Sylvanian Melody: Mori no Nakama to Odorimasho!

name: System Malfunction
summary: "System Malfunction" is a first-person horror game set in a mysterious building. The player takes on the role of a security guard who witnesses strange occurrences during the night shift. In a fear-inducing environment, the player explores the building to uncover hidden truths.

name: Synth Riders: Rick Astley - "Never Gonna Give You Up"
summary: Add Rick Astley - "Never Gonna Give You Up" to your library! Welcome back to the 1980s, Players! You knew a “Side B” was coming to our Mixtape and this time we're delivering seven huge hits from the era when the only thing bigger than the music was the hair!

name: Syberia
summary: Join Kate Walker as she travels to remote locations and time periods in this timeless voyage to discover her true destiny.

name: Synth Race
summary: Race against up to 12 friends in Synth Race. Run, jump, and slide your way to victory across 16 levels featuring a variety of obstacle courses.

name: Syndrome
summary:
You wake up on a spaceship, dazed and confused from the effects of cryosleep, and begin to search for the rest of the crew. Where could they have gone? All too suddenly, you discover that most of them are dead, and those still alive are… changed.

With Syndrome, Camel 101 takes first person survival horror back to its roots. In the dark confines of the ship, you look for ways to defend yourself. There are a few weapons scattered about, but nowhere near enough ammunition to deal with all the transformed monstrosities.

To survive and uncover the events that took place while you were asleep, you can’t always face your enemies head on; sometimes hiding and breathing as noiselessly as possible is your best course of action.

Careful resource management is a key part of Syndrome, but so is learning your enemies’ behavior. What will attract their attention? What will give you a few precious seconds to pass by undetected? Take note―each misstep could be deadly.

name: Synth Riders: Infected Mushroom Music Pack

name: Symphony of Eternity
summary:
A fantasy RPG full of monsters, legendary weapons and drama!

A high quality fantasy RPG full of monsters, legendary weapons and dramas!

This story mainly includes two factor: One is the quest for a legendary weapon "Regratlute" which makes its bearer's desires come true.
The hero Kreist is the cool guy who're willing to get the weapon and take the happy golden years, rescuing his concerned people with the power of Regratlute. His friend Dauturu is the hot-hearted ancient golem who agrees Kreist's dream.
Another factor is the coup d'etat of Eashtend kingdom. Honesty and kind king, queen, ladies and gentlemen in the royal family are totally killed by the traitor, lady Safario with the dark desire to conquer whole the world.
This two storyline becomes into one stream when Laishutia who says she is the escaped princess of Eashtend royal family encounters Kreist and Dauturu. To get back the Eashtend from traiter's clutch, they decide to be a party to seek Regratlute and defeat the traitors.

"A Mind & Body Bending Puzzle"

Hercules is messed up… Turns out throwing a party with gods while his parents are away and tearing the whole universe apart was not a great idea in the end. Only you can help him to put the universe back together before Zeus comes back! Grab your device and sit tight. Because this puzzle game is not like any other. These puzzles will bend your body as much as your mind. Here is your invitation to the ‘70s Olympus to push the limits of your body and mind.

name: Symphony of Seven Souls
summary:
Sleepless nights staring at a blank score page as you try to write your latest symphony have taken their toll.

Your creative well has all but dried up!

If you are to still the unrelenting pressure to create, then you will have to take a more drastic approach...

Rosin up your bow and take to the streets, searching for the willing dead to join your unholy orchestra. Perhaps then you can finally write the Symphony of Seven Souls!

name: Syvnta: Sovereignty
summary: A decision-making card game where you play as a king ruling a nation in the 1940s. As war breaks out in neighboring countries, you must lead wisely; swiping left or right to make choices. Your goal: keep your people safe, maintain stability, and avoid being drawn into the conflict rule for a decade.

name: Synthwave Burnout VR
summary: Synthwave Burnout VR is an explosive arcade racing game in VR, inspired by the aesthetics of the ’80s and synthwave style. Strap on your headset, rev your engine, and blaze through neon-soaked tracks where every move, turn, and crash feels like you’re in the heart of a glowing retro-futuristic storm

name: Syn
summary:
An accident interrupts Roark's religious initiation and plunges him into adventure. Run, jump, solve music-based puzzles, and save Roark's tribe from destruction. No prior music knowledge required, just ears and eyes.

Adventure and mystery await.

An adaptive soundtrack which interacts with the world
What you do in the world changes the song. Changes in the song affect the world.

The soundtrack plays a note causing a platform appear. You jump on the note to cross a cliff before it disappears.

You use a magic spell to shift the pitch of the song up. The note-platform moves up as well. You can now reach a higher place.

You change the song's tempo. The flow of time changes.

You change the key of a song. The world's gravity changes.

You get the idea.

No prior music knowledge required, just ears and eyes.

name: Synth Riders: The Midnight - "Sunset"
summary: Add “Sunset" - by The Midnight to your library!Ride off into the Sunset with this first single from the “Endless Summer” album, dripping with pure synthwave nostalgia. Considered one of The Midnight's signature songs, “Sunset” is often played last at their live shows.

name: Synth Riders: Bad Religion - "21st Century (Digital Boy)"
summary: Recorded in 1990 by punk icons Bad Religion, at first what seems like a rejection of modern consumerist culture is intended more ironically. Lovers of gaming and tech themselves, the band could see that youth were going to be affected - for good and bad - by digital technology.

name: Syberia Trilogy
summary:
Experience the complete adventures of Kate Walker in this complete box including Syberia 1, 2 and 3.

Syberia 1

In Syberia, join Kate Walker on an extraordinary journey that takes her all the way from Western Europe to the far reaches of Eastern Russia. You will come across a host of endearing characters and incredible locations as you search for tracesof Hans Voralberg, the genius inventor of the automatons. It is a search that will take you to the legendary island of Syberia, in the far North of the continent, where the last living mammoths reside, hidden from modern eyes...

Syberia 2

Continue the adventure in Syberia 2! After roaming Europe from West to East in search of Hans, Kate Walker sets out on another long journey, this time across the Great North. She will soon be faced with the dangers of the wild, religious fanaticism, and poachers seeking to lay their hands on the precious ivory of the Mammoths… What will become of Kate Walker and her friends? Find out wherever you happen to be!

Syberia 3

The limitless imagination of Benoit Sokal continues in Syberia 3, focusing on an entirely new adventure. After abandoning the island, Kate is found dying on the edge of a river by the Youkole tribe, a nomadic people migrating with their snow ostriches. Stuck in Valsembor village, together they must find a way to continue their journey in a race against their enemies and unexpected obstacles, not to mention Kate\'s past, which catches up with her.

name: Synth Riders: The Interrupters - "Gave You Everything"
Syberia: The World Before - Deluxe Edition
summary:
Includes the game and Deluxe Edition content.

- A short version of the Syberia: The World Before – Prologue script by Benoît Sokal and Lucas Lagravette

name: Synth Riders + Experiences
summary: Synth Riders experiences are meticulously crafted animations, inspired by, and perfectly synchronized to the music. Embark on an adventure where music and visuals come together in immersive music videos that we call Experiences.

name: System Critical: The Race Against Time
summary: Fun Run and Gun Platformer VR Shooter. Blast your arm cannon,use Grenades and melee weapons, Run, Jump, and Double Jump to dodge Projectiles and make your way through the carefully crafted levels. Discover secret areas and destroy objects while Navigating obstacles and defeat bosses to progress

name: Synth Riders: Gorillaz - "Cracker Island"
summary: Add “Cracker Island” by Gorillaz to your library!Featuring American bassist, singer and songwriter Thundercat. The track was released on 22 June 2022 as the first single from their upcoming eighth studio album, Cracker Island.

name: Syberia Collection
summary: Syberia 1 and 2 on a single disc or download.

name: Synthetic Dreams: Falling
summary: Synthetic Dreams: Falling is a science-fiction visual novel about human feelings, friendship, love and memories.

name: Syphon Filter: Logan's Shadow
summary: Syphon Filter: Logan's Shadow is a third-person shooter developed by Bend Studio and published by Sony Computer Entertainment. Released in October 2007 for the PlayStation Portable (PSP), it is the sixth instalment in the Syphon Filter series. The game follows secret agent Gabe Logan as he embarks on a mission to recover a stolen weapon of mass destruction, while dealing with betrayal and uncovering a deeper conspiracy.

name: Synth Pong
summary: Synth Pong is a twist on the classic Pong game and is perfect for anyone who loves the 80's synthwave aesthetic. You can challenge your friends in intense PvP sessions or enjoy the game solo in story mode, as well as a series of levels and challenges.

name: Synth Riders: Soundgarden - "Black Hole Sun"
summary: Add Soundgarden - "Black Hole Sun" to your library!Music that rips you out of your seat — that's Rock from the 1990s! The hard driving riffs and high energy lyrics that defined a decade are now attacking the rails in Synth Riders.

name: Synth Riders: Muse - "The Dark Side"
summary: The second track of Muse's “Simulation Theory” continues to explore the struggle to escape from a dystopia with controlling technologies, from our own anxieties and from the Dark Side.

name: Sylvan Disappearance
summary: Sylvan Disappearance is a mystery visual novel with an epistolary component. In the course of the story, you follow Mirabelle's life in a seaside city, and read the correspondence she receives from her friends Martin and Célia.

name: Synth Riders: Blur - "Song 2"
summary: Add Blur - "Song 2" to your library!Music that rips you out of your seat — that's Rock from the 1990s! The hard driving riffs and high energy lyrics that defined a decade are now attacking the rails in Synth Riders.

name: SynthVR
summary:
SynthVR is the synth nerd’s sci-fi fantasy: A modular synthesizer environment built from the ground up for virtual reality. 
 
Based on the Eurorack standard and reimagined for VR, SynthVR offers an exciting and accesible path into the world of modular synth music. It comes packed with studio-quality synth modules including oscillators, sequencers, effects, logic and more. If you built something cool you can share it in a heartbeat and if you're looking for inspiration you can surf amazing community patches at random. 
 
What will you make today? Mad-scientist-style electronica, ambient drones or hard techno?

name: Synth Riders: Starcadian - "Manuals"
summary: “Manuals” - StarcadianWith self-described “orchestral, spacy, disco funk vibes”, Starcadian blends multiple genres together into something retrofuturistic with a groove you definitely won't need a manual to find.

name: Synth Riders: Kendrick Lamar - "Humble." + Experience
summary: Step into Kendrick Lamar's world with the Synth Riders Experience for "HUMBLE." — an immersive musical journey inspired by the iconic music video.

name: Syrup 2: Candy Alchemy RPG
summary: SYRUP 2: CANDY ALCHEMY RPG is a direct sequel to Syrup and the Ultimate Sweet. As the title implies, the series has evolved into a fully featured RPG! Synthesize candies, battle monsters, and complete quests while discovering more about the world beyond Atelier Sweets!

name: Synth Riders: David Guetta & OneRepublic - "I Don't Wanna Wait"

name: Synthwave Smashers
summary: Synthwave Smashers is a retro-inspired throwback to the classic brick-breaking arcade games of the '70s and '80s.

name: Synth Riders: Muse - "Reapers"
summary: Matt Bellamy's unrelenting guitar shredding on this track from 2016's “Drones” sets the tone for this reaction to the rise of drone warfare overlaid on a cold landscape of relationship breakdown.

name: Syndicate
summary: The 3DO port controls the game through a controller instead of mouse. The game also has different colors on the HUD and the mini-map, the menus before missions have different button highlights due to the controller, as well as having overall different sound generation for music.

name: Synth Riders: Red Hot Chili Peppers - "Give It Away"
summary: Add Red Hot Chili Peppers - "Give It Away" to your library!Music that rips you out of your seat — that's Rock from the 1990s! The hard driving riffs and high energy lyrics that defined a decade are now attacking the rails in Synth Riders.

name: Sydless
summary: Sydless is a Fast FPS where your only weapon is a deadly bouncing ball. The more you punch it, the faster it gets—becoming a high speed projectile of destruction. You play as Diego, a ‘90s fast-food worker trapped in an anomaly, each door dragging you deeper into warped versions of the restaurant.

name: Synth Riders: Muse - "Uprising"
summary: Muse's best selling single of all time from the 2009 album “The Resistance”, has the band blending glam rock and 80s synths into a song about mistrust of power and authority.

name: Symmetrical Logic Puzzles 1000
summary: A luxurious puzzle game where you separate scattered gems into different rooms. However, the rooms must be point-symmetric with the gems at the center.

name: Synth Riders: Toto - "Africa"
summary: Add Toto - "Africa" to your library! Welcome back to the 1980s, Players! You knew a “Side B” was coming to our Mixtape and this time we're delivering seven huge hits from the era when the only thing bigger than the music was the hair!

name: Synth Riders: The Offspring - "Come Out and Play"
Synth Riders: The Offspring - "Self-Esteem"
summary: Often saved for the final song of their live shows, this hugely popular crowd favourite from The Offspring's “Smash” album is a grunge-filled cautionary tale of being trapped inside a toxic relationship and coming to the realisation that to escape it, you first need self esteem.

name: SYS: Save Your Soul
summary: As a prototype AI trying to escape a secret facility, you explore abandoned complexes, gather ingredients, craft weapons, tools, and machines, and face malfunctioning robots with no guidance to find the exit.

name: Synth Riders: Daryl Hall & John Oates - "Out of Touch"
summary: Add Daryl Hall & John Oates - "Out of Touch" to your library! Welcome back to the 1980s, Players! You knew a “Side B” was coming to our Mixtape and this time we're delivering seven huge hits from the era when the only thing bigger than the music was the hair!

name: Syncblade: Prototype
summary: A rhythm game where you slash through waves of Zombeats to the music you love, playing as Akemi, a unique mysterious samurai. Import your favorite songs and unleash beat-synced attacks.

name: Synco Path: Automaton Prison
summary: Trapped in a surreal prison cell, Avery Stardust, a rogue automaton, has only 17 days to enter his reset code and accept a new life as determined by the Stagnation Protocol. But when the mystery of the Synco Path program unravels, Avery will question everything he believes to be true.

name: Synth Riders: Lady Gaga Music Pack
Synth Riders: 80s Mixtape Side B Music Pack
Synth Riders: Current Waves Music Pack
Synth Riders: Synthwave Essentials 3 Music Pack
Symbio
summary: In Symbio, two forest creatures that could have not been more different team up in order to climb a tree. Being either nocturnal or diurnal, the two animals have to rely on their partner to guide them through the darkness. During their journey, the two players that can not see each other not only have to communicate, but also need to hold hands in order to complete tasks. Symbio is a new and fresh approach to cooperative gaming by incorporating physical, human touch into its gameplay and a unique experience that can barely be described in words.

name: Synth Riders: 80s Mixtape - Side B
summary:
Welcome back to the 1980s, Players! You knew a “Side B” was coming to our Mixtape and this time we’re delivering seven huge hits from the era when the only thing bigger than the music was the hair!

“80s Mixtape - Side B” wakes you up with unforgettable tracks and makes you never wanna give up playing this collection. These chart-toppers – all from the decade that inspired Synth Riders neon-soaked worlds – will take you back to the 80s-themed Endless Café stage as you dance to the sounds of Queen, The Cure, and Wham!, and more!

name: Synth Riders: Lindsey Stirling - "Mirage"
summary: This collaboration with songwriter-rapper and dancer Raja Kumari is full of Indian cultural influence, with lyrics in Hindi and Bollywood musical drama. Lindsey writes "A glimmering mirage in the distance can pull us away from the sustaining reality that is at our fingertips."

name: Syobon Action NES Edition
summary: Syobon Action NES Edition features 5 difficult levels made to test your mario skills. It also has a stylized Syobon Action design, changing the sprites of objects and enemies.

name: Symbiosis
summary: Online cooperative or solo survival and action RPG set in a procedural alien world. Explore, survive, battle bosses and gather resources to customize your equipment and defend your bases from creatures drawn by the electromagnetism of your technology.

name: Synth Riders: Muse - "Starlight"
summary: Take the Synth Riders Experience for 2006's epic rock ballad “Starlight” and sail across the oceans of space and time that separate a traveller from his loved ones as he has the revelation of what truly matters in life and love.

name: Synth Riders: Jamie Berry - "Lost In The Rhythm"
summary: Jamie Berry found a musical home for the past six years in Leeds, UK; with his main focus on honing 20s and 30s swing influences into House and Electro genres. Jamie Berry is recognized for his musical couplet of shuffling modern beats and vintage swing sounds.

name: Synth Riders: Gorillaz - "On Melancholy Hill"
summary: Add “On Melancholy Hill” by Gorillaz to your library!Released in 2010, this pop-infused track takes you through the band's thoughts on consumerism and society but this time through paradoxes of upbeat tunes.

name: Synth Riders: Sia - "Gimme Love"
summary: Add Sia - "Gimme Love" to your library!Those songs on your playlist you can't get out of your head? They're right here in Current Waves, the latest Synth Riders music pack! It's loaded with chart-topping hits from artists you love.

name: Symphony of the Machine
summary: An ancient tower stands in a barren land - ascend it and discover its mysterious powers. With the tower’s guardian by your side, conduct the weather to breathe life back into the lands around you. Immerse yourself in the beauty of Symphony of the Machine’s world.

name: Synth Riders: Challenges+ Update
summary:
The Synth Riders team challenges YOU! Think you’ve got what it takes to not just complete a song and earn a top score on leaderboards? We’re now throwing every trick at you to defeat you with our new Challenges+ feature.

Everything from alien invaders that attack the rails to trip up your high score run. Maybe the on-screen notes will vanish, or change colors, or shrink...

name: Syzygy: The Power of the Eclipse
summary: "The syzygy is the alignment of the sun, moon and earth, which only occurs every 300 years. During that time, the gods are "mortal". They lose almost entirely that which makes them invincible, and a serious wound is capable of making them succumb... to death."

name: Synth Retro Vapor Wave
summary: Relaxing game, players drive the car to avoid colliding with other vehicles on the road. Support importing local music and car decal pictures. There are currently 10 maps, 5 cars, 20 music, AI co-driver, dynamic raindrop windows, and a large number of custom effect options.

name: Synchro
summary: Uncover the corporate lies! Assemble your underground roguelite team and rise to the top in the cyberpunk world of Synchro. Use telepathy to read the thoughts of citizens and the plans of your enemies to outsmart them in tactical, turn-based combat.

name: Systematic Insanity
summary: Nami - a perfect student - accepts a "special award" on her Graduation Day - but suddenly finds herself facing the horrors of a one-day nightmare.

name: Synthopolis
summary: Face off and claim the Color at all costs — the life-saving resource of humanity hidden in the mysterious city of Synthopolis. Outplay your opponent in this competitive and visually groundbreaking game.

name: Symphone
summary: Symphone is a narrative platformer where you play as Euphony, a voiceless bunny, who must collect lost souls, overcome obstacles, and bring light and harmony back to her world.

name: Synth Riders: Artemas - "I Like the Way You Kiss Me"
summary:
Add Artemas - "i like the way you kiss me" to your library!

Those songs on your playlist you can’t get out of your head? They’re right here in Current Waves, the latest Synth Riders music pack! It’s loaded with chart-topping hits from artists you love.

name: Syphon Filter
summary: Syphon Filter is a third-person shooter stealth video game developed by Eidetic and published by 989 Studios exclusively for PlayStation. The plot centers on special agents Gabriel "Gabe" Logan and Lian Xing who are tasked by the United States government to apprehend a German international terrorist.

name: Syndicate
summary: Syndicate is a strategic action game set in a dystopian future where corporate entities vie for global dominance. Players control a syndicate, expanding their influence across a world map divided into territories. Starting from a European base, players deploy agents to infiltrate and conquer adjacent regions through covert operations and violence. Once a territory is captured, players can impose taxes to increase revenue, but must balance this with the risk of inciting rebellions. The game involves managing resources, dispatching agents to eliminate threats both foreign and domestic, and defending against rival syndicates' incursions. Success requires careful strategic planning, efficient resource management, and the ability to outmaneuver opponents on a global scale. The ultimate goal is to achieve world domination by controlling all territories and overcoming all challenges.

name: Symploke: Legend of Gustavo Bueno - Chapter 2
summary: Symploke: Legend of Gustavo Bueno - Chapter 2 is a classic point and click adventure set in a Spanish university and inspired in one of the most influential contemporary philosophers in the world. Play Chapter 2 only if you got through Chapter 1.

name: Synth Riders: Pegboard Nerds - "Moshi"
summary: The legendary Pegboard Nerds and Tokyo Machine want to see your hands up for the electro house “MOSHI” filled with chiptune sounds and a thumping bassline - let's go!.

name: Symphony of Souls
summary: Save your beloved from the clutches of the God of the Dead! Symphony of Souls is a rhythm-based platformer about the Greek myth of Orpheus. Traverse the Underworld attempting to reach your goal to the beats of the music. Your performance also affects it, unlocking more elements the better you play!

name: Syndicate of Souls
summary: A tactical MOBA with a classic old-school feel and a few innovative twists. In "Syndicate of Souls", battle unfolds across three distinct maps. "Roadway To Ruin" is a 1v1 snowy bridge, providing tense duels. "Deserted Stronghold", a 3v3 map, places players amid swampy ruins, emphasizing team tactics. Lastly, "Dreamfall Grove", a 5v5 battleground, immerses players in a mystical forest with vibrant fauna, promoting expansive team strategies. Each map reflects the game`s emphasis on tactical gameplay, strategic positioning, and environmental interaction.

name: Synth Riders: Gorillaz - "Sleeping Powder"
summary: Add “Sleeping Powder” by Gorillaz to your library!Through deliberate design (and in contrast to Humanz), this song doesn't feature any musical collaborators but only Damon Albarn, speaking through the perspective of fictional band member 2-D.

name: System Shock 2
summary: A first-person cyberpunk exploratory horror RPG and sequel to System Shock (1994) in which a soldier wakes up in the starship Von Braun in the aftermath of a disaster and finds himself in the midst of a conflict between SHODAN, the artificial intelligence antagonist of System Shock seeking mastery over humanity, and The Many, a flesh-based psychic hive mind led by the ship's corrupted AI.

name: Synth Riders: Lindsey Stirling - "Shadows"
summary: Heavily influenced by EDM and Synthwave, this track from Lindsey's self-titled 2012 debut album is a bounding and joyous ride. You can imagine dancing to this song alongside your own shadow, as Lindsey does in her live performances of this track.

name: Synth Riders: FM-84 & Ollie Wride - "Running in the Night"
summary: A massive synthwave hit for producer Col Bennett, better known as FM-84, which pairs sparkling synths with the incredible vocals of long time collaborator Ollie Wride resulting in a modern-yet-classic 80s soundscape.

name: Synth Riders: Simple Minds - "Don't You (Forget About Me)"
summary: Add Simple Minds - "Don't You (Forget About Me)" to your library! Welcome back to the 1980s, Players! You knew a “Side B” was coming to our Mixtape and this time we're delivering seven huge hits from the era when the only thing bigger than the music was the hair!

name: Synth Riders: Wham! - "Wake Me Up Before You Go-Go"
summary: Add Wham! - "Wake Me Up Before You Go-Go" to your library! Welcome back to the 1980s, Players! You knew a “Side B” was coming to our Mixtape and this time we're delivering seven huge hits from the era when the only thing bigger than the music was the hair!

name: Synth Riders: Muse Music Pack & Experience
summary: The Muse Music Pack pays tribute to these incredible British electro-rockers, with five tracks including their best-selling single of all time and spanning twelve years of their career, from 2006 to 2018. Influenced by electronic, progressive and glam rock, classical and rock opera, they blend these styles into a truly distinctive Muse sound, topped by Matt Bellamy’s soaring vocals.

name: Synth Riders: Groovin' Essentials
summary: Get your funk’n’groove on with Synth Riders and the Groovin’ Essentials Music Pack, featuring Bruno Mars, Silk Sonic & Starcadian in a 24K-lineup of award-winning hits. Contains 5 songs with strong roots in disco & funk.

name: Syd of Valis
summary:
Yuko Ahso looks like an ordinary grammar school student, but she is actually the Valis Warrior.

"I defeated King Rogles of the Dark World with the Valis sword which was given to me by Queen Valia, but my friend Reiko died in the process" Yuko went home by train after that terrible fight. She didn’t have the slightest idea that she would be summoned to fight again.

"Yuko..." said a familiar voice. “Reiko," said Yuko, "is that you? But I thought you..." Reiko quickly admonished, “Go and see Queen Valia, Yuko. Emperor Megas has threatened Dream World and our friend Vecanti.

When Yuko was told of Vecanti’s great danger, a burning desire moved Yuko to action. She has risen to crush Megas’ ambition!

name: Synth Riders: Nitro Fun - "New Game"
summary: Nitro Fun are all about the retro gaming, pulling together 8-bit game classic samples and throwing them down into an electro house dubstep mix to create “New Game”

name: Synced
summary: Synced is a companion shooter game set in a techno-apocalyptic future. You are a Runner who must fight against enemy teams and synchronize with Nano companion classes to deploy in combat. Strengthen your squad, upgrade your weapons, and discover the mysteries of the Meridian.

name: Syobon Action
summary:
Commonly known as "Cat Mario", Syobon Action is a 'masocore' parody of Super Mario Bros., featuring an anthropomorphic cat. The game deliberately subverts many of the mechanics that one would expect to find in a platformer. Players must use trial and error to figure out how to pass the game's myriad traps.

It was re-released as an open-source version for Windows and AmigaOS, under the name Open Syobon Action.

name: Synth
summary: Synth is a strategic action game, in which the player must find an exit in a procedurally generated landscape. The player is equipped with a laser, bombs, and a device that acts as a vacuum or blower. The overall goal is to reach the highest level possible.

name: Synth Riders: Jack Harlow - "Lovin On Me"
summary: Add Jack Harlow - "Lovin On Me" to your library!Those songs on your playlist you cant get out of your head? Theyre right here in Current Waves, the latest Synth Riders music pack! Its loaded with chart-topping hits from artists you love.

name: Syobon No Action Special
summary:
Did you play the original Syobon Action, and thought it was fun?...

No?

Well, this is a very SPECIAL edition of the game! No more trolling, 13 new levels, and many, many new features!

A completely new almost troll-free platformer based on the original Super Mario Bros and Syobon Action.

name: Symploke: Legend of Gustavo Bueno - Chapter 1
summary: Symploke: Legend of Gustavo Bueno - Chapter 1 is a classic point and click adventure set in a Spanish university and inspired in one of the most influential contemporary philosophers in the world. Play Chapter 1 and take care in your first day of class!

name: Sylphy and the Sleepless Island
summary: One night while on a job, a small-time thief named Sylphy overhears a rumor about a powerful artifact called the Orb of the Abyss. Hearing that it will be vulnerable, she sets sail for the island.

name: Synth Riders: Riot - "Take That"
summary: There's a party over here with RIOT's “Take That”, where the music's bangin' and you can dance all night. So come on - show us the moves you got!

name: Syncers
summary: Syncers - A Multiplayer/PvP, low-poly, space brawler, from the depths of indie space.

name: System Shock
summary: After 22 years, cyberpunk cult classic System Shock is getting an update. A "reimagined" version of the 1994 Windows PC game is in the works at Night Dive Studios for PC and Xbox One, and it's a project that company founder Stephen Kick says he can hardly believe is really happening.

name: Syberia: The World Before - Collector's Edition
summary:
Syberia: The World Before Collector’s Edition will include:
- Full Game
- Metal Case
- Adjustable Figurine of Kate & Dana
- Artbook
- Music Box
- Map of Vaghen
- Exclusive Lithography
- Keychain
- Set of Postcards
