name: System Critical III
summary: Step into the fast-paced, high-energy world of System Critical 3, the ultimate VR platformer-shooter designed exclusively for PSVR2. With intense gunplay, gravity-defying jumps, and mind-bending virtual environments, you’ll navigate a futuristic cyber-realm where every battle is a test of skill and reflexes. Experience ruthless boss battles, traverse dynamic landscapes, and master an arsenal of powerful weapons—all in stunning virtual reality.

name: Synth Riders: Lady Gaga - "The Dead Dance"
summary: Add Lady Gaga - "The Dead Dance" to your library!

name: Synth Riders: Monstercat Music Pack
summary: The monstercat music pack takes you to the future with 5 carefully selected songs from electronic dance music artists such as Tokyo Machine, Pegboard Nerds, RIOT, and Au5.

name: Synthetic Paradox
summary: Synthetic Paradox is a sci-fi action rogue-lite mixed with tower defense elements. Fight never-ending waves of enemies and bosses, collect items and build up your defenses alone or in co-op for up to 4 players! Discover unique combinations of towers and items to help you protect your Core!

name: Sylvan Meadows
summary: A village simulation game with RPG elements. Keep a little outpost running while bonding with its inhabitants. Make friends, solve problems, and take a nap in the meadow when you're done.

name: S.Y.K: Shinsetsu Saiyuuki Portable
summary: S.Y.K: Shinsetsu Saiyuuki Portable is a port of S.Y.K: Shinsetsu Saiyuuki for the PlayStation Portable.

name: Synth Riders: Starcadian - "Supersymmetry"
summary: “Supersymmetry” - StarcadianFilled with influences from Daft Punk to Giorgio Moroder, you'll find the shimmering lyrical optimism of this track from 2013's Sunset Blood irresistible on the dance floor.

name: Syntaxia
summary: SYNTAXIA is a dream-dark adventure game that allows you to rewrite reality itself by changing the words that describe it. Use your creativity and intuition to escape. Which path will you choose?

name: Synth Riders: Lady Gaga - "Born This Way"
summary: Add Lady Gaga - "Born This Way" to your library!

name: Synduality: Echo of Ada - Deluxe Edition
summary:
The Deluxe Edition includes:
• SYNDUALITY Echo of Ada
• Deluxe Edition Content
Be ready for anything with a new outfit, access to Deluxe Drifter Pass seasonal bonuses, and a Magus Remake Ticket!
- Magus Costume School Uniform
- Deluxe Drifter Pass Voucher
- Magus Remake Ticket

name: Syberia 3
summary: Syberia 3 takes you inside an enchanting, mysterious universe full of life for you to explore in 3D. Plunged into the heart of a world inhabited by a cast of interesting characters, you'll discover and experience a fabulous tale as imagined by Benoit Sokal.

name: Sylphine
summary: Discover your destiny in a world where two dimensions collide in a conflict that threatens all life. Explore two unique dimensions, cultivate friendships, and form relationships as you delve into the world of Sylphine!

name: Synth Riders: Starship - "We Built This City"
summary: Add Starship - "We Built this City" to your library!We just want to dance here, but someone stole the stage! A protest song against the closure of live music venues in Los Angeles, Starship celebrates music as the city's true cultural foundation.

name: Synthetic Orders
summary: A quick, hypercasual pattern-memory game. Watch the left-right yellow signals, memorize the sequence, and repeat it using two simple buttons - no grinding, no complex mechanics.

name: Systemic War
summary:
SYSTEMIC WAR is a next-generation strategy game that fuses grand geopolitical decision-making with real-time tactical combat.

Command entire nations: manage economies, build alliances, and secure logistics across a living global map. Then step onto the battlefield—deploy drones, leverage electronic warfare, and lead authentic units in real-world locations.

Every decision reshapes the course of history.

Plan like a strategist. Fight like a commander.

name: Sylvan Tale
summary: Sylvan Tale follows the typical action-adventure game formula: The player controls a character who must solve puzzles, fight enemies, and talk to non-player characters in order to acquire special powers and items that will allow him to unlock new areas of the game world and solve the puzzles within. While the player may revisit areas, the game progresses in an essentially linear fashion, as each area can only be accessed if Zetts(the player character) has acquired a specific item or ability from the previous area.

name: Sydney Hunter and the Curse of the Mayan
summary: The third game in the Sydney Hunter series.

name: Synth Riders: Swingrowers - "No Strings Attached"
summary: Swingrowers are an accomplished four-piece band from Palermo in Sicily off the southern coast of Italy. Blending jazz to hip-hop, electronica to gypsy swing their sound has been steadily evolving since their debut into a unique vintage-inspired pop.

name: Syrup and the Ultimate Sweet
summary: In a magical town there lives a candy alchemist, Syrup, who one day discovers a candy golem in her basement. Where did she come from? Who could've made her? Go find out! Featuring a memorable cast of colorful characters and 10 unique endings. Your choices affect the story! Will Syrup achieve her dream of making the Ultimate Sweet, or will she meet a much more tragic fate...

name: Sylvio: Black Waters
summary: Stranded on an alien planet. Witness the past to discover the truth in a game of enthralling atmospheric exploration horror.

name: SysAdmin Odyssey: Back to the office
summary: The SysAdmin simulator is a sandbox in which you can try on the role of a system administrator. Every new game day you will face different tasks and problems in the office where you work.

name: Syphon Filter 2
summary: A port of Syphon Filter 2, a third-person shooter stealth game originally released on the PlayStation console, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

name: Synthrally
summary: Synthrally is a local multiplayer arcade sports game with simple, fast-paced action. Choose from an array of selectable classes, map variants, and alternate play modes to mix things up and keep gameplay exciting!

name: Symphorix
summary: Symphorix is a survivorlike roguelite that blends ambient music with strategic pre-planning. Customize your Core, harness recurring musical cues, and shape your defenses to overcome challenging bullet-hell waves. Let the music be your guide.

name: Sylvie RPG: 7 Elf Apocalypse
summary:
In a strange world beset by ruin, a woman named Sylvie appears to fight battles.
What will you find in this world?

Sylvie RPG is a 49x49 resolution action RPG with bump-style action combat.

name: System of Souls
summary:
System of souls is a first-person puzzle and platform video game. You will control
L-064N, a soul transferred to a last robot model that will try to remember who it is
and what it does in the ION facilities with the help of Aura, the artificial intelligence of
the place, which will make it go through different tests logic with the final purpose to
stimulate your neural network and obtain the memories of L-064N.

name: Synesthesia
summary: Is there an escape to the endless spiral? 『Synesthesia』 is a multi-route sci-fi mystery visual novel. Follow a group of college students with unique cognitive abilities who soon learn something is amiss at the institute sworn to help them, leading to implications larger than they ever imagined.

name: Synth Riders: Gorillaz - "New Gold"
summary: Add “New Gold” by Gorillaz to your library!Featuring Australian music project Tame Impala, and American rapper Bootie Brown, marking the latter's second collaboration with the band since "Dirty Harry" in 2005.

name: Sym.Bios: Torn Asunder
summary: Sym.Bios: Torn Asunder is a text-based visual novel with tricky moral choices and beautiful art. Its epic sci-fi story is told through vivid dialogue, featuring 7 main characters. All your decisions will have consequences down the line: will you succeed in your mission?

name: Syzygy
summary: Syzygy is an enigmatic game focused on the ability of morphing at will a square world into triangles and hexagons

name: Sync or Sink
summary: Trapped in a sinking submarine, two players must communicate through walkie-talkies to solve puzzles, complete tasks, navigate the depths, and escape before time runs out.

name: Synth Riders: Starcadian - "New Cydonia"
summary: Add “New Cydonia” by Starcadian (feat. Hayley) to your library!Blur the lines between memory and reality as you float into the land of New Cydonia with Starcadian. Almost a modern take on Toto's classic “Africa”, and filled with nostalgia.

name: Synth Riders: Electro Swing Essentials
summary: The Electro Swing Essentials pack is the perfect cocktail of vintage swing and jazz with EDM, house and hip hop - and go heavy on the brass. You can’t help but dance and jive, because it don’t mean a thing if it ain’t got that swing.

name: Synth Riders: The Midnight - "Days of Thunder"
summary: Like something straight out of an 80s movie, this melodic synthwave track comes complete with a saxophone player in the back seat as you cruise along the Pacific highway.

name: Synth Riders: The Midnight - "Jason"
summary: Add “Jason” by The Midnight to your library!Paying stylistic homage to classic 80s tracks like “Maniac” with the perfect drums plus a killer sax, this track from their first full-length album “Endless Summer” features the voice of Nikki Flores to keep you running and dancing.

name: Synthetik: Arena
summary: Synthetik: Arena is a fast paced Top-Down Shooter set in a retro-futuristic world, combining the next level in gun-play with powerful tech to experiment with. Players are thrown into their Android subconscious and face the varied challenges of the machine god Zir to escape and end the Machine Legion.

name: Synapse
summary: Combine brutal and tactile firepower with surging telekinetic abilities as you dive into a hostile mindscape. Harness this lethal combination and master your own combat style as you dive deeper into a surreal world. Launch, levitate, and smash your enemies through destructible environments using motion controls and eye tracking-assisted aiming.

name: Syracuse
summary:
In the year 213 B.C. the town of Syracuse in southern Sicily, was besieged by the troops of the Roman consul Marcellus. The battle lasted three years, giving Archimedes time to perfect his ingenious system for defending Syracuse.

Archimedes' idea was to reflect the sun off a mirror onto the enemy ships. The sunlight reflected in this way would be concentrated enough to set fire to the Roman warships.

Despite a heroic defense, the Romans won. As for Archimedes, he was so absorbed in a geometry problem when the Romans landed, that he was killed by a Roman soldier because he refused to answer his questions.

With the Syracuse game you will be able to be part of this historic event as often as you like.
So, to your joy-sticks ! And do not forget that the battle must start at sunrise and finish at sunset.

name: Synther
summary: Synther is a detective game with action elements, located in the neofuturistic city of Vesser in the year 2065. The player takes on the role of an agent for the Steiger Corporation - apart of an elite unit tasked with the retrieval of synthetic bodies and artificial intelligence. The player's mission is to find and eliminate three synthetic fugitives. To do this, the agent will have to use a number of special skills and the latest technological advancements.

name: System Shock: Enhanced Edition
summary:
Exactly twenty one years after its first release, System Shock is back! The Enhanced Edition adds a modern touch to this true classic gem, without taking anything from its unmistakable atmosphere. See for yourself that the game that has been called the benchmark for intelligent first-person gaming, has lost nothing of its ability to keep you on the edge of your seat.

You're a renowned hacker, the most notorious cyberspace thief in the corporate world. Caught during a risky break-in, you become indentured to Diego, a greedy Trioptium exec who bankrolls a rare cyberjack implant operation. After six months in a healing coma, you awaken to the twisted aftermath of a terrible disaster. Where are the surgeons? Why is the station in such disrepair? Slowly, the chilling realization that something is very wrong creeps over you.

Once a prime corporate research facility, Citadel now teems with mindless cyborgs, robots and terribly mutated beings, all programmed to serve SHODAN, a ruthless A.I. There's scarcely time to think before it unleashes the first terror...

name: Synth Riders: Silk Sonic - "Skate"
summary: “Skate” - Silk Sonic (Feat Bruno Mars & Anderson .Paak)The Grammy Award-winning collaboration between Bruno Mars and Anderson .Paak takes us back to a 70's roller disco in this track, filled with smooth strings and good summertime vibes.

name: Synth Riders: Lady Gaga Music Pack
summary: Ride the rails with a Lady Gaga themed song pack for all you Synth Riders! Featuring 11 top hits like The Dead Dance, Abracadabra, and Poker Face.

name: Synchrobeatings
summary:
A game created with Magnus Pålsson and Hannes Rahm for the GMC Jam #17.

In Synchrobeatings, you play the frustrated conductor of an ensemble. It's concert night, and your band No Sync is playing horrifically out of sync. When waving your conductor's stick around doesn't work to get the band in sync, you turn to violence!

name: Synth Riders: Lady Gaga - "Bloody Mary"
summary: Add Lady Gaga - "Bloody Mary" to your library!

name: Synth Riders: Lady Gaga - "Paparazzi"
summary: Add Lady Gaga - "Paparazzi" to your library!

name: Synth Laser
summary: Synth Laser is a dynamic laser maze rhythm game. Get ready to dodge and weave around the deadly and stunning laser show, built upon the outrun and synthwave music.

name: Synth Riders: League of Legends - "Awaken"
summary: “Awaken” - League of Legends feat. Valerie Broussard & Ray ChenAn atmospheric anthem matched with a battle-filled cinematic on a grand scale called players to awaken and find their destiny for Season 2019.

name: System Shock 2: 25th Anniversary Remaster
summary:
The original System Shock 2 is a genre-defining experience that established innovative gameplay mechanics that are a staple of the FPS and RPG genre today. Delve through the corridors of the derelict ship Von Braun and immerse yourself in the story rich atmosphere and environments. Explore deck by deck and unravel the horrifying fate of the Von Braun and her crew.

System Shock 2: 25th Anniversary modernizes the 1999 sci-fi horror classic using Nightdive Studios’ proprietary KEX Engine for a definitive version of the game featuring Enhanced Characters, Weapon Models and Animations, Up to 144FPS performance with ultra-widescreen support, Optimized Controller support, 50 Achievements to unlock, Additional Mod Support and Quality of Life Improvements.

name: Symphony of the Stars
summary: A retro RPG that features puzzles, exploration, and turn-based combat.

name: Synaxarion Christian Stories: Holy Martyr Savvas the Goth
summary: Born in 334, Savvas the Goth underwent fierce persecution as a Christian. This is his story.

name: Synth Riders: Lady Gaga - "Bad Romance"
summary: Add Lady Gaga - "Bad Romance" to your library!

name: Synth Riders: Lady Gaga & Beyoncé - "Telephone"
summary: Add Lady Gaga - "Telephone" (feat. Beyoncé) to your library!

name: >//:System.Hack
summary: >//:System.Hack is a sim-rpg set in a dystopian future. Take the role of a programmer-turned-hacker as they begin their criminal career. While hacking, enter a virtual world, delving the digital dungeons of Systems for wealth and experience.

name: Synth Riders: Muse - "Madness"
summary: With stripped back production and layered vocals, this track from 2012's “The 2nd Law” is a reflection on relationships and love through conflict.

name: Synth Riders: Caravan Palace - "Lone Digger"
summary: The Caravan Palace Pack will have you dancing to 5 tracks from this “eccentric electronic” group from France. From their high energy hits to the dreamy optimistic pop from their later albums, Caravan Palace's unique sound blends past and future together making this pack a joyfully nostalgic ride.

name: Sylia
summary:
Three gigantic and mysterious Cubes have landed on Sylia's main islands. Inside them, unknown creatures (… Aliens) are gathered and plot on how to take control of the lands and ultimately extract the planet's energy – that would be the end of all life. Is Sylia a realm about to fall?

Maybe not! A group of heroes is not willing to let that happen! They are Sylia's finest knight, wizardress, cleric and warrior. Supported and guided by their nation, they must enter the Cube where the Aliens' Queen (a mysterious woman by the name of Lady Godiva) is and stop her! But the task seems overwhelming…

Who is going to win the fight for Sylia? Will the land thrive or will the Aliens gain its energy and destroy every life form in the process?

name: Synthetic Captive
summary: Synthetic Captive is a first-person stealth escape game designed to reveal that the most terrifying monsters originate from the human mind. In this dungeon, escape is nearly impossible. You play as the protagonist, exploring the dungeon prison, struggling to survive and escape.

name: Synth Riders
summary: An action-dance VR rhythm game with custom song support and a thriving multiplayer community.

name: Synth Riders: Rancid - "Time Bomb"
summary: Formed from members of ska-punk pioneers Operation Ivy, Rancid brings a blend of punk and two-tone into this high tempo ska-punk song about the life of the ticking “Time Bomb” that is a young man consumed by gang life.

name: Symmetra's Qualifying Matches
summary: Stay on the payload or go on some dates.

name: Sylvio 2
summary: All Juliette ever wanted was to go back home. With the help of her ghost recording equipment she makes her way through flooded landscapes, buried houses and abandoned apartments. This is calm psychological horror with emphasis on atmosphere.

name: Synephoria
summary: Ambient VR art studio where your voice shapes a living grotto and you paint with light, color, and geometric forms. Export your creations to use in other 3D apps for fine-tuning or animation.

name: Synth Riders: Gorillaz - "Clint Eastwood"
summary: Add “Clint Eastwood” by Gorillaz to your library! Released as the first single from their self-titled debut album on 5 March 2001. The song is a mix of electronic music, dub, hip hop and rock.

name: Syberia: Remastered
summary: More than 20 years after its original release, Syberia is reborn in a fully modernized version. Rediscover its iconic locations and unforgettable characters through a stunning visual overhaul, redesigned gameplay, and the same captivating storytelling that made it a classic.

name: System Invaders
summary: Experience waves upon waves of viruses that have infected your computer. 5 Chapters with over 125 Waves of enemies! Play with your friends in local or online co-op! Can you destroy all the viruses?

name: Synth Swinger
summary: Will you find the end?

name: Synonymy
summary: Synonymy is a non-profit, educational word game narrated by Richard Dawkins where players are challenged to find a path between random words through their network of synonyms. By taking the synonym of a word, and then a synonym of that synonym, and so on, you can ultimately arrive at any other word in a language.

name: Synth Riders: Queen - "Don't Stop Me Now"
summary: Add Queen - "Don't Stop Me Now" to your library! Welcome back to the 1980s, Players! You knew a “Side B” was coming to our Mixtape and this time we're delivering seven huge hits from the era when the only thing bigger than the music was the hair!

name: Synthrome
summary:
SYNTHROME is designed with speedrunners in mind. It mixes early 2000s 3D platformer charm with modern gameplay & game design.

The game is all about speed, precision, and fluid movement.
Every jump, slide, and burst of speed must be carefully timed, turning each level into a test of skill and strategy.

Explore levels packed with shortcuts, secrets, and rewards. No hand-holding—just pure challenge. Prove your skill.

name: Synduality: Echo of Ada
summary:
You and an AI mech named Magus explore a dystopian landscape in the year 2222. A catastrophic poisonous rain event known as Tears of the New Moon nearly eradicated the human race — survivors fled to the underground city of Amasia. To survive, the player character known as a “Drifter” must sell AO Crystals, which can only be harvested from the polluted outside world. To travel, you’ll drive around in a vehicle called the Cradle Coffin, which you can customize.

The game will also have a unique PvP option, wherein playing online will support encounters with others plays on their own missions - you might collide head to head while trying to gather precious supplies

name: Sym
summary: Sym is a puzzle-platformer that explores social anxiety disorder. Play as Josh, a teenage boy trying to reconcile a maze of two contrasting worlds that coexist within the blank spaces of each other - his perception of reality, and the world he created to avoid his fears.

name: Syphon Filter: Dark Mirror
summary: Dark Mirror is the sequel to Syphon Filter: The Omega Strain. In Dark Mirror, a mysterious operation at an Alaskan oil reserve has Gabe Logan investigating the cause. He is quickly presented with a deeper operation that has him venturing across the world.

name: Symphony of War: The Nephilim Saga
summary: Enter Tahnra, a land savaged by war. You, a fresh academy graduate with humble beginnings, will grow to lead a grand army against a corrupt adversary. Gather heroes, form bonds, and lead your force in turn-based battles. Make use of tactics, terrain, morale and more to bring peace to the land!

name: Synthetik: Legion Rising
summary: Synthetik: Legion Rising is an unforgiving shooter rogue-lite set in a world overrun by machines. Battle from floor to floor, defeating an array of robotic forces using powerful weapons, upgrades, and quick reflexes in this gun-play focused fun-fest!

name: Synthesis of Corruption
summary: Emergency Protocol activated: Dark Energy Particle Synthesis failed. Now you — late and alone — must navigate a facility where science and sanity have collapsed. Face entities born from dark energy corruption in this atmospheric FPS-horror hybrid where human ambition meets primal terror.

name: Sydney and the Cicadas in: Immanentize
summary: In the summer of 1992, three girls, Sydney, Ruby, and Tally, began exploring their first album in a trip to the woods. Only Sydney returned to complete it. The events of their trip are the subject of the point-and-click puzzle adventure Sydney and the Cicadas in "Immanentize".

name: Syberia II
summary: An unlikely pair, young Kate Walker and old, eccentric Hans Voralberg now set off on a journey together: in search of the last of the fabled Syberian mammoths at the heart of a long and forgotten universe. The surreal quest Hans began alone several years ago will come to a final close as he and Kate face obstacles far more dangerous than ever before, testing their courage and determination.

name: Symbiotic Love
summary: Symbiotic Love is a coming-of-age Yuri Visual Novel set in an All Girls' High School. What has fate in store for love so perfect, so symbiotic, that they could only live, and perish together?

name: Syrian Warfare
summary: Real Time Strategy with a high degree of realism. The game is based on a true story.

name: Syndicate Wars
summary: Welcome to an urban hell of ultra-violent mayhem. Welcome to Syndicate Wars where you’ll take control of a squad of cybernetically enhanced Agents and wreak havoc on the enemy. Funnel money towards research that will allow you to upgrade your team and make them into more efficient killing machines. Use the environment to assassinate, destroy, and eliminate your targets all from a classic isometric perspective. If you need cannon fodder, why not set your Agents loose armed with Persuadertrons to control huge crowds, or even enemy agents, and get them to do the dirty work for you? So whether you’re keeping EuroCorp in the black or burning infidels for the New Epoch, Syndicate Wars will have you giddily carving a path to victory. Welcome to the merciless future of violent squad-based real-time tactics!

name: Syder Arcade
summary:
Get back to some serious Old-School gaming with Syder Arcade! A love letter to Amiga games of the 90′, no coins, no upgrade grinding, just your tenacity and a motherload of alien invaders.

Syder Arcade is a free scrolling, multi directional shoot ’em up, an uncompromised old-school experience, furious, challenging, straightforward. This game will bring you back in time, when bulky starships were cool and games were about player skill and swearing madly at your computer.

name: Synthaar
summary: Synthaar is a game where Life Simulation meets Grand Strategy. Create your legacy, build your home, business, base and beyond, and accumulate power and wealth to ensure your descendants have a prosperous future under your care.

name: System Mania
summary:
System Mania is a management game where the player must flip switches, turn cranks and press buttons to fix machines. Each one of the 90 levels is a different machine, with an array of controls scattered around the screen. Using the mouse cursor, the player must interact with the ones that have a red warning light on. When fixed, the controls often throw bonus medals that must be quickly collected, before falling to the bottom of the screen.

Switches and buttons only require one mouse click to be fixed. Wheels and cranks need to be turned around a couple of times to turn off the light. Cords have to be pulled by their handle. Sliders need to be dragged to a red indicator. Strings have to be plucked. Hourglasses need to be turned upside-down to move the sand to the other compartment. Some buttons have doors that open and close over them all the time, requiring precise timing to be pressed. Dials have to be turn to the number indicated in the red light. Gear sticks need to be placed on the correct position, also indicated by a number in the red light. The keypads have a numerical sequence displayed besides the red lights that must be typed in. The piano has a number assigned for each key, and the display shows the numbers of a tune that must be played. The TV has a joystick and a button, and the objective is to move a targeting cross over a square to destroy it.

Each interaction gives a small amount of money that can be spent on power-ups, in a shop between levels. They appear as three yellow buttons on the screen, that help by slowing the game speed and changing other gameplay parameters. Random events occur to provide additional challenges, where the lights turn off, darkening the screen with the exception of a halo around the cursor, and steam clouds cover the screen making everything more difficult to read.

name: Symulator Tuska 2014
summary: A clicker game.

name: Synnergy Games Bundle
summary: Synnergy Circle Games Bundle. Get Alpacapaca Dash + Arrowstorm Ascendant

name: Symphony of Steel
summary: Small industrial base map; the layout is a tribute to ztn's Bloodrun. It comes with a custom skybox.

name: Synth Riders: Cut Capers - "Let's Start Again (Odd Chap Remix)"
summary: Experience the familiar with a fresh spin as Cut Capers invites you to embrace the joy of starting anew.

name: Sylvania Families 4: Meguru Kisetsu no Tapestry
summary: Sylvania Families 4: Meguru Kisetsu no Tapestry is a Role-Playing game, published by Epoch, which was released in Japan in 2002.

name: Synth Riders: Balduin, Wolfgang Lohr - "Magic Man"
summary: Let Balduin & Wolfgang Lohr take you on a sonic adventure where every note is a spell-binding revelation.

name: Synth Riders: Jamie Berry - "Guilty Pleasure"
summary: Jamie Berry & Little Violet take you on a guilt-free musical escapade, the perfect fusion of electro beats and sultry vocals.

name: Synth Riders: INXS - "New Sensation"
summary: Add INXS - "New Sensation" to your library!Representing late 80s rock is Australia's INXS, featuring huge drums, trademark relentless guitars and a sax solo all alongside the distinctive vocals of charismatic front man Michael Hutchence

name: Synth Run
summary: Synth Run is a speedy runner game that puts you in control of a rather *out of control* ship that hurtles towards total oblivion. Guide it over, around or whichever way you damn please to avoid various obstacles and avoid said total oblivion!

name: Symptom of Love
summary: Plunge into this story and see what happens!

name: Syzgy
summary: the NOSTALGIC MUSIC ARCADE experience you've been craving

name: SyntaxBomb
summary: full-on retro-tastic action

name: Symbol Link
summary:
Solve puzzles pairing up matching symbols with a single path.
Team up with your iPhone or iPad artificial intelligence to score points by drawing autolinks – two symbols automatically connected when definite path between them exists.

name: Syystem: The Phantom Train
summary: Delve into the haunted underground of Capital City in this paranormal mystery visual novel. Chase down the elusive phantom of an ill-fated railcar and the curse left behind by its doomed passengers. Tread lightly--you aren't the only one scouring the tunnels...

name: SynCo 2321
summary: SynCo 2321 is a thrilling third-person action RPG shooter. Explore stylized environments ranging from ruined cities to alien worlds. Uncover the greatest plot to ever threaten humanity as you battle your way from an underground bunker across the galaxy.

name: Synopsis Quest
summary: A JRPG with 25 acts. It is also a flash game that you can finish in ten minutes.

name: System Rush
summary: Futuristic racing game on the N-Gage.

name: Synchronizers: Undead Marines
summary: This is a high-quality three-lane tower defense game for a single player initially (and online coop in a near future) for Windows. This is a twist of the Tower Defense genre, keeping what we all love and including interesting mechanics, characters, loads of action and an incredible soundtrack!

name: Symphonics
summary: A unique way to compose music in VR by physically manipulating the melodies and beats you write. Interact with your songs in a completely new way.

name: Synergism
summary: Free-to-win idle/incremental browser-based game.

name: Synesthetic
summary: Experience your music like never before with Synesthetic, the first IOS game that truly syncs with your music. Embark on an out of this world rollercoaster ride, dodging obstacles and going though loops, trying to improve your highscore. Everything (the speed, obstacles and colors) is in tune to your music.

name: Synthesis
summary: Synthesis is a visual novel created for Antithesis, a Persona 5 Joker x Crow roleswap fanzine. In an alternate universe where Goro Akechi leads the Phantom Thieves and Akira Kurusu/Ren Amamiya is the Detective Prince, Synthesis lets you experience Joker and Crow's friendship and rivalry from a whole new perspective.

name: Symmetric
summary: This game is an interesting puzzle, and its object is to draw a line through checkpoints. The main difficulty is to plan the route; to make it right, you need to think carefully sometimes. The further you progress, the harder the levels become, and the challenges are getting more interesting.

name: Syd Mead's Terraforming
summary: This side-scrolling shooter features background design from Syd Mead.

name: Symphonica
summary: A mix between a visual novel and a rhythm game developed by the creators of Elite Beats Agents.

name: Sydney Shark
summary: The sequel to the flash game Miami Shark, Sydney Shark has players embark on another adventure in the waters of Sydney. The gameplay remains unchanged, offering the same action-packed experience of destruction and mayhem of the original game. However, Sydney Shark introduces new ways to wreak havoc by taking down helicopters carrying koalas, obliterating crocodile blimps, and intercepting nuclear missiles.

name: System Protocol One
summary: System Protocol One is a retro-inspired tower defense game. Developed by While True Fork.

name: Syuukun in Mirror World
summary: The game is a short walking simulator that explores a 3D space. However, the controlling character is trapped in the Mirror World, and the player must control him from the real world to lead him to the goal.

name: Syndicate
summary: The Super Nintendo/Famicom port of Syndicate has a more cartoony graphics style, different control set, and completely new levels.

name: Syrenka Racer
summary: Syrenka Racer is a simple arcade racing game, dedicated to the memory of the Polish car Syrenka, produced between 1951-1983.

name: Synonym
summary: Synonym is an atmospheric puzzle game with mechanics inspired by mimicry. Manipulate blocks that will copy your position, height and rotation.

name: Syndoy
summary: Syndoy is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame.

name: Synthetik: Ultimate
summary: Fight against relentless opponents and unforgiving bosses encased in ever-changing environments. Master the uniquely deep and satisfying weapon mechanics and the unprecedented amount of customization. Discover a seemingly unending amount of weapons, items, perks and character upgrades.

name: Syphon Filter 2
summary: Syphon Filter 2 is a third-person shooter stealth video game developed by Eidetic and published by 989 Studios exclusively for PlayStation. Hours after the events of the first game, Gabriel Logan and Lian Xing are enemies of the state to the Agency after uncovering its connection to Syphon Filter, labelled as terrorists to the general public.

name: Sync Adventure
summary: One button to sync with Slime. See if you can control him.

name: Synoptix
summary: Daily browser game in french about finding the title of movie from its redacted synopsis. The game can be played solo or in team.

name: Syn-Factor
summary: An adventure game in the style of Myst, you are tasked with trying to uncover an intergalactic mystery with your wits and computer chip implanted in your brain.

name: Sycamore
summary: Sycamore is my submission for LSDJAM 2023, made in 5 days. It's a short top-down game with a surreal look. The goal is to find items hidden in the worlds you reach. The game is focused on exploration, so you'll have to interact with the level to find. There's a planets order, so keep this in mind. The game has two states: When you're in the planets and when you're in the spaceship. The spaceship controls quick, while the cowboy controls at a slower pace.

name: Sylvania Family: Yosei no Stick to Fushigi no Ki - Maron Inu no Onna no Ko
summary: Sylvania Family: Yosei no Stick to Fushigi no Ki - Maron Inu no Onna no Ko is a Role-Playing game, published by Epoch, which was released in Japan in 2003.

name: Synchronizacja
summary: The first chapter of the Polish game Visual Novel. Enter the world of Synchronization and discover its secrets.

name: Synthwaifu: Neon Space Fighter
summary: Synthwaifu: Neon Space Fighter is inspired by the arcade games of the 80s. Destroy waves of enemy spaceships to score points and unlock all the drawings.

name: Synergia: NextGen Edition
summary: At the end of the world, love is sometimes the ultimate crime. Now remastered in high resolution, also featuring the SUNRISE expansion and bonus OST and in-game Artbook.

name: System Escape
summary: Can you escape this difficult underground facility? Robots listen for your every move and cameras monitor sensitive areas. You'll find a utility device and laser gun, but being stealthy will be your best chance at staying alive! Made for VR, but supports non-VR play too.

name: System32
summary: Teleport into a 1988 personal computer running a visually intense bullet hell simulation. Fight alongside your team to destroy Russian hackers in real-time.

name: Synthalaxy
summary: Synthalaxy is a top-down tactical shooter where the enemies have a series of weak points rather than traditional health. Manipulate enemies in order to complete complex puzzles. Traverse worlds, take aim, and solve puzzles to save the Synthalaxy!

name: System Syzygy
summary: System Syzygy is a story and a puzzle game, in the style of Cliff Johnson's classic Macintosh games The Fool's Errand and 3 in Three, and of Andrew Plotkin's System's Twilight. As you move through the game, solving a variety of different kinds of puzzles, the game tells the story a piece at a time. By the end of the game, all the different puzzles and pieces of the story come together into a single meta-puzzle.

name: Synth Riders: Tamela D'Amico, Wolfgang Lohr - "Boring 20s"
summary: Step into the roaring '20s reimagined with a modern twist, a guaranteed toe-tapping good time that's never boring!

name: Synch
summary: Synch is a free, turn-based strategy game. Choose your perfect team of bots to take down the evil boss bot and his floating flunkies!

name: S.Y.K: Renshouden
summary: S.Y.K: Renshouden is a fan disc of S.Y.K: Shinsetsu Saiyuuki. You can enjoy sweeter love stories with target characters and past stories, which were previously untold.

name: Symb Eco
summary: A free to play voice role-playing modern era game. Players can create a companies, trade with other players, manufacture, give services, or become a criminal and make the cities yours, become a hitman, drug dealer, thief. To suppress crime the law enforcement, save lives as an paramedic, or put out fires as fireman.

name: Synthetic Soul: Neon
summary: Synthetic Soul: Neon is an immersive modern life sim with an in-depth robot companion. Discover the past and change your future.

name: S.Y.K: Renshouden Portable
summary: S.Y.K: Renshouden Portable is a port of S.Y.K: Renshouden for PlayStation Portable.

name: Synth Ninja
summary: Synth Ninja brings together the unforgettable Synthwave theme of the 80's with ninjas and offers a unique VR experience. Your goal in the game hit the targets with shurikens. Each target have random blue and red colors. You have to shot with shuriken that match the color of targets.

name: Syndeo-Complex
summary: In Syndeo-Complex you will explore five different environments connected by a hub. Each level has its own mechanics, weapons, enemies and bosses. The Keli, small droids, will (probably) guide you in your quest.

name: Syndicate: American Revolt
summary: American Revolt is an add-on pack to Syndicate. It requires the original game and includes 3 new weapons, 21 new single player missions, and 10 multiplayer missions.

name: Synth Riders: Swingrowers - "Rose"
summary: Swingrowers present a track that blossoms with infectious energy and irresistible melodies.

name: Synthetic
summary: Put on your VR headset, get inside the warhammer, go into the post-post apopcolyptic world of Synthetic. fight challenging VR enemy's with an attachment of a wide arsenal of weaponry, from shoulder missle launchers to arm gatling guns!

name: Synaxarion: Acts Part 1
summary: Starting from the Crucifixion of Christ, you play as a disciple of Christ and witness key events in the early Church. ‘Synaxarion: Acts Part 1’ takes place during a portion of the Biblical Book of Acts that is enriched with additional history and tradition from the Synaxarion.

name: Synced Warriors
summary: Synced Warriors is a puzzle game where each button press controls all of the characters on the screen at the same time. You must navigate them to different locations while killing off the extra warriors.

name: Synergia: Sunrise
summary: One year after the events of the Synergia Incident, Cila and Mara's lives have drastically changed, as have the lives of all those around them. This DLC is a small glimpse into their future outside of The Empire, and the repercussions of their actions during the main game.

name: Synthesia
summary: A piano rythm/music based game. Synthesia follows the same path as many current rythm based games but deviates in the way that it also doubles as a learning tool.

name: Symbol of Sacrifice
