A sacrifice must be made — one that will reshape the entire story and events that unfold. Who will you choose to sacrifice?

name: Sym-Bionic Titan: Teenage Warriors
summary: A 2D platformer browser game based on the cartoon series Sym-bionic Titan. You can choose between two characters: Lance or Ilana, to defeat enemies and progess through the levels.

name: Syphon Filter: Logan's Shadow
summary: A port of Syphon Filter: Logan’s Shadow, originally released on the PlayStation Portable system, featuring optimised rendering, rewind, quick saving, and custom video filters.

name: Synthetic Dreams
summary: When the last human closes their eyes, our digital memories become synthetic dreams.

name: Sylvie Miniature
summary:
Sylvie's world was destroyed again. What will you find in the rubble?

Sylvie miniature is a "seven game" — 7x7 tiles, 7x7 screens, 7x7 world.

name: System Restore
summary: Play as an Elite Agent of SRF the System Restore Force, with the sole purpose of purging the Virus and it's corruption, climb through the different layers of the Source code and uncover it's mysteries, defeat bosses, and find the Master of the infection, allowing you to RESTORE THE SYSTEM!

name: Synzzball
summary: Navigate the ball through challenging levels by avoiding hazards. Use the editor to create and share your own level.

name: Synthwave Glider
summary: Synthwave Glider lets you blast through an abstract world inspired by the 80s, have fun as you chase after your friends high score!

name: Syrian Warfare: Battlefields
summary: DLC includes a full suite of tools for creating and editing missions. You will now be able to re-enact battles of your own choosing!

name: Sylvie Lime
summary:
Sylvie Lime is an absurdist girls' love exploration platformer.
Turn into a lime and collect different items in a lovely open world.
️ Meet various girls in the computer and try to help them.

name: System 10
summary: System 10 is a home video game machine released by Epoch in 1978. Developed jointly with NEC and equipped with NEC's µPD770C chip. It has 10 built-in games, and you can play ponclone games such as tennis, ping-pong, and soccer, as well as shooting games using a gun-shaped controller. It is an early home-use game machine classified as the first generation. Later, a cheaper version of "System 10 M2" was also released. There is also an OEM model called "Toshiba Video Game TVG-610" which uses the same IC and has the same content developed by Epoch and released by Toshiba.

name: System Zero
summary: System Zero is a hacker simulation game. You must use your hacking tools for accessing to the devices. You will become a black hat who wants to make his living.

name: System's Twilight
summary: A shareware puzzle game for early versions of Macintosh, this was a self-published game developed by Andrew Plotkin.

name: System Upkeep
summary: Operate machinery, brew coffee, shovel coal & flick switches in this UNFAIR & CHALLENGING multi-tasking JOYRIDE.

name: Sydney Hunter and the Shrines of Peril
summary: A retro action platformer for Intellivision and mobile.

name: SynthWaves
summary: A retrowave tower defense game where the player must manage their arsenal of sentries to fight off waves of synths, stop their invasion, and take the fight to their home.

name: Symphonic Mayhem
summary: A multiplayer death match with tanks. What more could you need? Play locally or online and attempt to destroy your enemies.

name: Sylvio and the Mountains Giants
summary: An unknow evil has come to disturb the fragile balance of the land of Yahouna. Only a clever and pure being can save them all...

name: Synaxarion Christian Stories: Great Martyr Christina of Tyre
Symbol
summary: Weird things on the side of the road.

name: Synthetica: Cyber Club Manager
summary: Run your own futuristic club in a world where high-tech meets fun nights out. Make your club the best by customizing android staff, pleasing different kinds of guests, and handling all the challenges of being the boss. Every choice you make shapes your club's success. Dive in!

name: Synestia
summary: A Synestia is a swirling cloud of cosmic debris coming together to form a planet... and that is exactly what you are doing. Create a planet and customize every part of it from the surface and atmosphere to the rings and moon. Take a moment to relax and enjoy your own tiny corner of the universe.

name: Symmetry Lines
summary: Simple puzzle game with symmetry and lines.

name: System Flaw Recruit
summary: DSi Ware game based on the original System Flaw in which you "hunt" for "flaws" in your environment using the DSi Camera.

name: System Aimed for Salvation
summary: Action - Adventure Boss Rush

name: Sync Your Mind
summary: Immerse in rhythm's embrace with Sync Your Mind. A 3D musical odyssey where beats and creativity collide. Conquer rhythmic realms or compose your own. Sync up, rise up, and let the harmonies of your mind unfold! 🚀 #SyncYourMind #RhythmGaming

name: System Death
summary: Stylistically rich retro fast-paced combat open world fps space shooter with different weapons, space traps and bosses

name: Synapse
summary: An upcoming cyberpunk RPG with turn-based combat

name: Syndrome VR
summary:
Syndrome, a sci-fi survival horror game that places you in a living hell inside a doomed starship. Find out what happened to your lost crew. Run. Hide. Fight. Survive.

Includes a Survival Game mode in Full VR.

name: Synthwave Escape
summary:
Retro Rhythm Puzzle Platformer game with an 80s inspired Synthwave Soundtrack.

Synthwave Escape is a Retro Rhythm Puzzle Platformer game with an 80s inspired Synthwave Soundtrack & Aesthetic.

Join Doc Grits' team of robots as they attempt to escape the Neon Bunker and defeat the heinously infamous Red Hawk. Use the Escape Bots' skills together to overcome challenges and make it safely to safety!

name: Syobon Action: New Something
summary: There are millions of Syobon Action Alternate Universes, which are known as "Syobonverses" that are characterized by changing the appearance of the world, although they are the same plot but with few differences and one of them is New Something, the cat Syobonina has to recover her "cocaine in the form of an Artichoke" and thus not be sad, lots of memes and no sense.

name: Syndicate Boyfriend: Gem Heist
summary: Socialite by day and cat burglar by night, you're the infamous marvel burglarizing Shine City's elites. Ever since your ex-partner betrayed you, you've sworn off working with others, but once you receive an enticing invitation from a group of alluring thieves, curiosity strikes. Can the four of you successfully infiltrate the world's most expensive casino to steal the pink diamond, or are these sly guys simply stray dogs?

name: Syder Reloaded
summary: Syder Reloaded is an overcharged and furious side-scrolling hybrid shoot 'em up. Jump back to the '90s when bulky tech was cool and games were all about skills and high scores. Syder Reloaded is a remastered and enhanced edition of Syder Arcade (2012).

name: Sylvanian Families: Yousei no Stick to Fushigi no Ki Maron Inu no Onna no ko
summary: The Sylvanian Families series drops the numbering scheme for this fifth RPG.

name: Sync
summary: Launch the SYNC protocol, where you are the ultimate weapon. Your job is to commandeer different robotic synth’s abilities in a high-octane, first-person frenzy. Master the art of SYNCing, and control the pace of battle.

name: Synthwave Hop
summary: Synthwave Hop, a hardcore game made for people who enjoy a challenge, and speed running. A game where time is your friend and your enemy. No complicated story, just speed and frustration. Can you be the fastest runner?

name: Synthetic Soul: Onyx
summary: Synthetic Soul: Onyx is an immersive futuristic life sim with an in-depth robot companion. Discover the future and restore the past.

name: Sylphia
summary: Sylphia is a vertical shooter published by Tonkin House. The game draws from Greek mythology and tells the story of Sylphia, a female warrior with a tragic destiny. Her tale starts as she lays fatally wounded in the temple of Athena - merciless monsters have taken over the city and she perished as she desperately tried to protect innocent villagers. The gods, touched by the sincerity of the young woman's devotion and love, decide to give Sylphia another chance... Now turned into a Sylphid with tremendous powers, the female warrior embarks on a long journey of revenge, ready to fight for her homeland. Sylphia starts equipped with a fairly basic fire weapon that can be upgraded in various ways - four different types based on the four basic elements are available throughout the game, from Fire (Red), Air (Green), Water (Blue) and Earth (Brown). Each weapon type is associated with an additional sub-weapon which range from Homing Fireballs (Red), Reverse Fire (Blue), Ring Blades (Green) and Rotating Rocks (Brown). Sylphia can also trigger a devastative special attack that deals great damage to on-screen enemies - this power is obviously available in limited quantities and may only be be used in desperate situations. Various other items are available for the taking, such as extra lives, Mirrors/Gems (slowly increase a health bar located at the bottom of the screen that gives the player an extra life when full) and Green Orbs (increase the active weapon's power level). Sylphia consists of eight stages and is single player only.

name: SYNC: Since You Never Came
summary: You have lost the love of your life. Overwhelmed by grief, you sit by her tomb, flipping through the pages of the journal that chronicles your life together.

name: System Goose Overload
summary: The great war between Geese and Humans has come to an end. All that remains of the Goose Empire, is you!

name: Symphony of the Night
summary: A game that takes place in a room. Also you can use Shift to go faster.

name: Symbiotic
summary: Symbiotic is an RPG Visual Novel hybrid centered around a school of children training to fight a war against another world. These brave students are given man-made symbiotes to fight the evil alien symbiotes that attach themselves to living beings. The question is, will Earth Survive?

name: Sync
summary: First Person Adventure game from Dead Pixel Entertainment exclusively for Wii U. The players finds themselves in a mysterious sci-fi world where they have to find data stations to ultimately destroy the dangerous A.I. called Sync.

name: Sylvester and Tweety
summary: Sylvester and Tweety was one of several games based on Warner Brother cartoons by Sunsoft. It eventually met its end when Sunsoft went bankrupt in early 1995.

name: Synesthesia Amnesia
summary: An Xbox Live Indie Game released in January 2011 by Robert Lane. The game is a 2D platfomer featuring collectibles and a story.

name: Synthalgia: Retro Arcade Racing
summary: Synthalgia is an arcade racing game set in the summers of the 1980’s. Drive dangerously, drive fast, earn credits, buy and upgrade cars all while jamming out to 80’s inspired music in a neon retrofuturistic world of fast cars, beaches and bright lights!

name: Symbiotic
summary: Symbiotic is a fast-paced, first-person roguelike shooter where you, an escaped prisoner, stole a real monster of a weapon: The Symbiote. Fight with an evolving weapon and escape!

name: Sync Sprint
summary: Dive into diverse dimensions, each brimming with unique and thrilling challenges. Conquer temples by blasting your way through intense action sequences and embark on exhilarating adventures in ever-changing realms! Repair the laboratory to unlock epic customization!

name: Sylvester & Tweety in Cagey Capers
summary: This legendary Looney Tunes duo make their video game debut - and what a performance! The eyepopping, cartoon like animation and ribtickling shenanigans seem never ending as you twy, twy, twy and twy again to swipe the little Tweety - with cat-astrophic results!

name: System Control
summary: System control is a submarine combat simulator featuring an analog control design. A strange anomaly has manifested deep in the ocean, and your government has tasked you with taking their fastest sub and making contact.

name: Syrian Warfare: Return to Palmyra
summary: A large expansion to "Syrian Warfare". A new single-player campaign is focused on the dramatic events between December 2016 and March 2017 around Palmyra.

name: System Crash
summary: System Crash is a story-driven cyberpunk collectible card game inspired by Blade Runner and Neuromancer. When corporations own everything and the line between man and machine is blurred, your only option is to fight to survive!

name: Synaptic Drive
summary: Bring blood to cyberspace. Strategic,high-paced arena battles start here.

name: System Crash: Underworld
summary: Underworld introduces an exciting new story campaign and a powerful new card set focused on turning your Archive (discard pile) into a potent resource.

name: Synth Ark
summary: Step into the cybernetic future in Synth Arkt, where classic gameplay meets a futuristic synthwave vibe!

name: Synso: Squid Harder!
summary: Squids with guns! Pink Robots! Devils from the 4th dimension! Shopping Trolleys and Lasers. When 4 worlds collide, only Synso (he's a squid, not an octopus!) can save the day. Psychedelic arena shooter action with visual and aural overload. Just the way sir likes it. Critically acclaimed and star of the Eurogamer Expo 2009 Indie Games Arcade, Squid Harder is an arena shooter like no other.

name: Symmodance
summary: Dive into the symphonic chaos of geometric warfare! Unleash futuristic weaponry, customize your hovering platform, conquer relentless foes and dance to victory in this mesmerizing reverse bullet hell shooter.

name: Syndrome: Extended Edition
summary: Explore the doomed starship Valkenburg and save yourself. Syndrome is a sci-fi horror experience with a simple goal. Stay in the shadows and survive!

name: Syzygy
summary: broken game / walking home simulator

name: Synstasis
summary: SYNSTASIS is a turn-based cyberpunk RPG with tactical elements, set in a post-libertarian future where governments have been deemed irrelevant and 90% of humanity live in megacities run entirely by corporations.

name: System Shock 3
summary: A followup to 1999's System Shock 2 being made by ex-Looking Glass and Bioshock Infinite developers.

name: System Intrusion
summary: Welcome to the virtual realm, where every byte matters in your struggle to restore balance as you fight against the an artificial enemy programmed to assimilate the entirety of virtual space.

name: Synami's Speedmaps
summary: 19 total speedmaps with minimal gameplay changes, such as making the pistol not entirely useless and buffs to the shotgun, chaingun and plasma rifle being present.

name: Syndrome: Ultimate Edition
summary: Along the base game, you also get acces to the Soundtrack DLC. In space, no one can hear you scream. Something from the abyss of space is kidnapping and killing the crew of the ship. And it doesn't stop hunting.

name: Symmetrain
summary: Choose a train and spot the differences in the passing landscape. The landscape left and right of the train tracks is mirrored. Almost. Find as many hidden differences as possible and restore the symmetry.

name: Synder
summary: Armies of demons have invaded Earth. Experience a survival adventure FPS that takes you through cities streets, subway tunnels, buildings in a futuristic fallen city and more! With focus on a combination of fast paced gameplay and fun mechanics discover the origins of this disaster

name: Synth War Tactics
summary: A cyber punk turn-based tactics game, customize your team of elite soldiers and lead them to victory across endless battlefields.

name: Syke
summary: Syke is a first-person exploratory puzzle game set in a mysterious and beautifully warped reality. You play as an individual making their way through areas of strange geometry; solving puzzles to piece together the story of their love.

name: Sylvantia
summary: Sylvantia is a mysterious creature collector. You find yourself lost in a giant forest controlled by ancient gods. Will you be able to make it out of the forest with the help of the there residing Antia´s?

name: Symposium of Grief
summary: You're a sad little dingus with a broken heart.

name: Synth Drift
summary: This is a straightforward racing game. Race to the goal(s) before getting hit by spikes.

name: Synthetic Hazard
summary: 2107 AD, Hopi Desert, Arizona. A secret biotech weapons laboratory has suffered a containment breach. A dangerous biological weapon capable of modifying machinery at its will has escaped. It wants to escape the facility and reach the surface. Stop it before it's too late.

name: Synthesis Universe: Episode 00
summary: Welcome to Synthesis Universe, host of a musical civilization, their technology is music. Experience -Story- through musical experiences happening all around you in real time using UE4.

name: Symphony of Science
summary: Medium-sized dark underground laboratory.

name: System Flaw
summary: DSi cartridge game in which you scan the environment using the DSi camera and eliminate "bugs".

name: Synthrun
summary: Synthrun is an action-platformer where you race through an abstract world. Have you got what it takes to collect all the energy orbs?

name: Synopsle
summary: A daily guessing game where players try to guess the names of two movies that have been merged into one via an AI description.

name: Sylvanian Families 4: Meguru Kisetsu no Tapestry
summary: The Sylvanian Families series moves to Game Boy Advance

name: SympathyKiss: Special Edition
summary:
Otome visual novel by Otomate.

The story of Sympathy Kiss involves the heroine who was working for almost a year at an app development company, and was used to the usual mediocrity of work. However, she is suddenly reassigned to the production department of an app that is about to end its service. She has to choose the ideal partner that will keep the app alive for years to come. Just what awaits her–?!

name: Symphony of Stars
summary: This is space combat with a twist. Choose a faction to fight for, colonize and defend planets for it, while also leading the attack against your rivals.

name: Symmetry: Path to Perfection
summary:
Symmetry is a relaxing while challenging puzzle game about symmetry. Improve your IQ and exercise your brain until you achieve perfection.

Different patterns will show up and you have to reflect the respective symmetric shape. During the game flow you will face a wide variety of obstacles that will test your IQ and make your brain work out! Flow freely on a relaxing and enjoyable game experience.

name: Symbitic Love
summary: 《寄甡》是一款百合向视觉小说游戏，讲述了一场现代百合版、宛如“罗密欧与朱丽叶”的凄美爱情故事。

name: System 15000
summary: System 15000 is a hacking simulator. In the game the player needs to transfer stolen money to his rightful owner.

name: Syndicate
summary: The Amiga and Amiga CD32 ports of Syndicate has a different color palette and lower resolution and most significantly, lacks any music – besides the intro – found in the original DOS release.

name: Syntherapy
summary: If an AI were sentient, how would you know if they were malfunctioning, or experiencing a mental health problem? A story-rich game that explores mental health and AI ethics in the form of therapy sessions with a sentient AI.

name: Symbol Sudoku
summary: Classic Sudoku, but with a twist--solve the game using Greek symbols.

name: Syndrome: Deluxe Edition
summary:
The Deluxe Edition includes:
- The game
- Art Book: Monster DLC.

name: Symphony of the Origin
summary:
The lands where the humans, elves and dwarves live continue to be attacked by hideous creatures that have appeared from the very bowels of the earth. The attacks are frequent and widespread, and the attackers commit the most terrible of atrocities.
These attackers have been dubbed the 'Evils of the Earth-depths'
One day, Granzalk Castle is the subject of an attack by the Evils of the Earth-depths.
In the midst of the fierce fighting, Ryle, a young apprentice swordsman whose parents were both killed in a previous attack by the Evils, and who vows revenge, finds himself in the underground chambers of the castle. In one of those chambers, he discovers a golem built to oppose the Evils.
And so the quest begins: Ryle takes the fate of the kingdom on his shoulders, and, along with Denoas, the golem built to oppose the Evils, sets off first to the village of the elves...

name: Syde Rugby League Simulator
summary: SYDE Rugby League Simulator is a simulator that runs entirely inside the windows command console. Simulate customizable Rugby League seasons with randomly generated teams & players.

name: Sylvanian Families 3: Hoshifuru Yoru no Sunadokei
summary:
The third RPG in the Sylvanian Families series.

You play as a girl from the Striped Cat family, traveling through past and present with your forest friends to retrieve the shining stars that have disappeared from Sylvanian Village.

name: Synnergist
summary: In Synnergist the player takes the role of Tim Machin, an ambitious young journalist forced by cruel circumstances to work for a trashy tabloid newspaper. Set in the year 2010, the game puts the player on the streets of New Arhus—a city of extremes, crammed with both cutting edge technology and the decaying remnants of a once proud past. Very soon, Tim finds himself on the trail of a sinister force that appears to be connected to the crime and killing...

name: Syndicate
summary: Set in 2069, Syndicate takes players into a dark, Machiavellian world run without government oversight with many syndicates vying for total dominance of their local market place. With no one to question their intentions or actions, three mega corporations - Eurocorp, Cayman Global, and Aspari - are at the forefront of this brutal war for control of the pivotal American market. In the world of Syndicate, everything is digitally connected, including the people. Players aren't limited to the weapons in their hands. Through DART 6 bio-chip technology implanted in their head, players can slow down time and breach the digital world around them to take down their foes using a variety of upgradable hacking mechanics. Syndicate's blend of fast-paced, futuristic, action shooter settings and story combined with innovative chip breach gameplay instantly immerses players in a unique digital world.

name: Synthwave Fury
summary: Speed and fight your way across an endless highway of neon lights and synthetic palm trees in this virtual world of pure retro '80s nostalgia.

name: Synthetic Soul 3
summary: Synthetic Soul 3 is an immersive modern life sim with in-depth robot companions. Discover your true worth and climb to the peak.

name: Syon
summary: A 2D horror to find and repel anomalies. Light the lantern of the girl and the ability of the ghost to fight back.

name: Sylvania Melody
summary: Sylvania Melody: Mori no Nakama to Odori Mashi! is an Action game, developed by Natsume and published by Epoch, which was released in Japan in 2000.

name: SymbioPhobia
summary: SymbioPhobiA is a short survival horror game, mainly from an isometric perspective that mixes action, exploration, puzzles and platforming that takes place in a futuristic and post-apocalyptic bunker that has an oppressive and claustrophobic atmosphere.

name: Synthetic Soul: Reset
summary: Synthetic Soul: Reset is a remaster of our first game in the series, remade in our new engine. Discover the secret of your robot, and change the world.

name: Synced: Winterfest Pack
summary: Unlock this DLC of SYNCED to obtain new Runner and weapon skins, and embrace fresh challenges in the new season - Lambent Dawn.

name: Systemic\\Rem
summary:
A Yume Nikki fangame made by Gali.

"8 comas. 8 of them within the span of a month?"

A quiet Canadian town is faced with a comatose epidemic... one with no clear cause. Doctors scramble to find a cure as quarantine torments the lives of multiple families.

You are a prodigy. A dream witch. Equipped with the means to remove nightmares and sleep paralysis demons, your career picks up when a new gig knocks at your door. You open it, and without knowing it, you have just taken your first step into a world of wonder, bizarreness, and dread, even for dreams.

Will you find and stop the cause of this horrible comatose outbreak in time, or will unseen forces assure you, your friends, and your family never wake up again?

name: Syrak: the War in the Middle-East
summary: SYRAK is a card-based strategy game set during the most complex war in recent history of the Middle-East. Local or Online game have you play as the Resistance Axis or the Western Defence Organization. Use powerful Political, Espionage and Military Cards to outwit and overwhelm your opponent.

name: Syzygy
summary: SYZYGY is a game about queer kids, punk rock, wanting to disappear, and the universal truth of punk: that no matter who you are, you will at some point feel like the whole world is against you.

name: SystemCrash92
summary: Face the machines of the evil hacker in this action roguelite. Your avatar will assist you in battle as you improve your skills with items and level up to build a powerful strategy. An unforgettable adventure for survival fans!

name: System Siege
summary: It's all out war and it's either us or them. Humans or Androids. Battle as different commanders in System Siege, a tactical turn-based strategy to defeat the androids and win not only the planet back, but the entire solar system.

name: SysOps Saga
summary: SysOps Saga is a simulation game that puts you in the shoes of a Site Reliability Engineer (SRE), managing the intricate web of software, security, and hardware to keep digital systems running. Developed by a FAANG veteran, this game offers an immersive and educational experience for IT enthusiasts.

name: Syscrusher
summary: Sci-fi first person shooter with a synth soundtrack.

name: Syphon Filter: The Omega Strain
summary: Syphon Filter: The Omega Strain is a third-person shooter developed by Bend Studio and published by Sony Computer Entertainment. Released in May 2004 for the PlayStation 2, it is the fourth instalment in the Syphon Filter series. The game follows a global bioterrorism crisis, and players assume the role of a new recruit in Gabe Logan’s agency, tasked with stopping the spread of the deadly Omega Strain virus.

name: Synchronicity
summary: 1v1 turn-based tactics, online or vs a practice-AI in a futuristic cyberpunk setting. Plan 3 steps in advance while your opponent does the same. Mind-game and outsmart your opponent with a variety of abilities, destructible and penetrable environments and a good strategy.

name: Sydney Hunter Collection
summary: The Sydney Hunter Collection brings together four great titles from CollectorVision Games, each originally released for a different classic retro gaming platform. Includes Sydney Hunter and the Shrines of Peril, Sydney Hunter and the Sacred Tribe, Sydney Hunter and the Caverns of Death, and Jester.

name: Sylvarcon 2049: A Cybersecurity Aventure
summary: A thrilling cyberpunk adventure packed with hacking and digital forensics challenges where the player will experience an in-depth immersion into the realm of cybersecurity.

name: Syncromania
summary: Syncromania is a modern side-scrolling hyper-action shoot-em-up game with platformer elements.

name: Syllogism
summary: Explore an open world full of beautiful views and locations, and enjoy a relaxing atmosphere while immersing yourself in unique challenges that will challenge your imagination and logical thinking.

name: Synthetic Love
summary: Biochemist Victor (the inventor of the serum) and three girls go to the isolated private residence high in the mountains. They work, they rest and make experiments there. The serum has an impressive effect – your sex satisfaction becomes incredible. But there's one unpleasant side effect – partial memory loss.

name: Synthwave Ascension
summary: Survive and fight off killer robots as you grow stronger and stronger! Synthwave Ascension is a top-down shooter with roguelite elements and synthwave themes.

name: SynthCave
summary: Defend your upgrade station and light your path using your gun while blasting away at enemies in this Synthwave inspired arcade wave shooter! Buy upgrades like Light Poles to illuminate areas and turrets to mow down the incoming waves. Can you take on the horde or will they take your station from you with sheer numbers? Find out now!

name: Sydney Hunter and the Sacred Tribe
summary: A Colecovision entry in the Sydney Hunter franchise.

name: SynthRunner
summary: In this futuristic urban environement, you are jumping from one building to another, slide under doors and pipes while performing parkour moves to run as fast as possible.

name: Synaesthete
summary: Synaesthete is a combination of arcade shooter and music/rhythm game made by students at DigiPen.

name: Syndicate Black Ops
summary:
The action takes place after the Dark ages (in a far future). You are a member from the Syndicate, a powerful criminal group specialist in assassination and delicate missions.

One of the more powerful mega corporation : Croon, contact you so that you "clean" their little error : Inadvertently they opened some hell's gate and the Federation send its choc troops in order to pacificate all of these things and to bring some proofs against Croon.

name: Synapses
summary:
A short 1 level platforming game made entirely from strata cut clay. Play as a neuron delivering information to the brain core, destroy neurons with sparks of electricity when they get in your way. Press 'F' to fire electricity, Arrow keys to move, 'space' to jump.

Music by Miles Pride.

TW: flashing colors

name: Sydney Hunter and the Caverns of Death
summary: Sydney Hunter and the Caverns of Death is a retro platformer that started as a Flash game before being ported to various older and modern platforms.

name: Sylvio
summary: Sylvio is a psychological horror game set in a tranquil, disturbing atmosphere. Help ghost recorder Juliette Waters face an evil curse and a wicked family cult with her microphone and the voices of the dead.

name: Syndicate
summary:
The Sega Mega Drive/Genesis and Sega CD port of Syndicate features much more cartoony styled graphics, different control set and completely new levels.

The Sega CD version has a different soundtrack which is the only difference between the two.

name: Synth Et Sis
summary: Discovery of queerness and the quest to live fully and wholeheartedly. A constant process of exploring and growing.

name: Synthwave Runner
summary: Synthwave Runner is a casual game where you have to jump over different obstacle to keep running and increase your highscore in an stunning synthwave style.

name: Synthbiotic Dungeon
summary: Synthbiotic Dungeon is a fast paced, isometric, online multiplayer dungeon crawler in which you make the dungeon. Play as one of up to three runners running the gauntlet or as the dungeon master pulling the strings.

name: Symbio
summary: Immerse yourself in a microscopic world teeming with life and multitudes of organisms and species trying to survive in the harsh environment of prehistoric Earth. Eat, breed and poop (yes, that too). And evolve from a single cell to a complex multicellular organism.

name: Syndication Cyberpunk
summary: Reclaim your empire as a Sci-fi cyberpunk syndicate.

name: Synth Riders: A-ha - "Take On Me"
summary: Add a-ha - "Take on Me" to your library!An evergreen New Wave hit, “Take On Me” packs the dance floor with infectious energy. Catchy riffs from swirling synths, topped by the stunning voice of Morten Harket as he hits that famous high note.

name: Synthwave Racers
summary: Race at hypersonic speeds through retro-inspired courses in Synthwave RacersⓇ, an indie-arcade racing game with melodic 80's-inspired synthwave tracks, and tight percision-based action racing gameplay.

name: Sybaritic Extravaganza
summary: Sybaritic Extravaganza is an RPG game where you have to help the protagonists fulfill the last wish of Caravella king and awaken the peoples for the last war with the monsters.

name: Syberia 3: Deluxe Edition
summary:
The Deluxe upgrade of Syberia 3 includes:
Digital Soundtracks (*mp3) by Inon Zur
Exclusive Digital 20 first pages of the next Comic Books (*Pdf)
Digital 1 Wallpaper

name: Syndicate
summary:
The Jaguar port is graphically mostly the same as the 3DO port. The main differences are different music due to different sound generation, the button highlights are different, and the mini-map is in the same style as the original DOS version but it retains the colors of the 3DO, as well as the mouse is tracked on the mini-map unlike any other version.
All the video sequences including the intro is replaced with a static image of the video.

name: Synthetic Fantasy;
summary: A "Visual Novel Play" about the nature of love and relationships! Caught between his fiance and an android, Dan Garland must make a choice that will change lives forever.

name: SynthFight
summary: Synthfight is a local 2v2 arena battle game designed to test your teamwork and tactics. Battle your friends and see who can clutch the narrow victory.

name: System City
summary: A platformer set in the world inside your computer! Help the citizens of hardware and software city keep the machines operational.

name: Sympathia
summary: 『Dodge × Beat』 Enjoy the world of sympathia in rhythm!

name: Symbiogenesis
summary: It is a completely new NFT entertainment that adds "game utility" to "10,000 NFT collectible art".

name: System Override
summary: System Override is a first-person, single player heist game where you play as a hacker clearing a route through a variety of traps that block the way of your non-playable companion on the field.

name: Syndicate Wars
summary:
The PlayStation port features a different introduction cutscene and some differences in certain levels.
The ability to research specific items does not exist in hits port, instead new items are being made available in a fixed order, following mission completions.

name: Syphon Filter
summary: A port of Syphon Filter, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

name: Symphony Stride
summary: Launch powerful combos in this fast and exciting deckbuilder roguelike. Choose two characters to form a team with unique combos for each pairing and embark on a procedurally generated quest of epic proportions!

name: Syko Swinger
summary: Experimental physics based casual game where player keeps a smooth rhythm of circular motion and avoids on screen obstacles.

name: Synth Riders: Devo - "Whip It"
summary: Add Devo - "Whip It" to your library!Put on your “energy dome” and venture into a beautiful world of de-evolution with Devo! These pioneers of US New Wave, have a satirical, nonsensical answer to all life's problems: just crack that whip!

name: Sybil's Tail
summary: Sybil's Tail is a tiny, 15-30 minute long platformer made for PICO-8. Run, jump, slide, grab, and toss your way through 6 bite-sized areas as you search for a mysterious meteorite that fell nearby!

name: Synthetic Soul
summary: Synthetic Soul is an immersive modern Rags to Riches life sim with an in-depth robot companion. What kind of person will you become once you truly have it all? Discover the secret of your robot, and change the world.

name: Synthroute 82
summary: Solo infinite destruction racing game

name: Synth Riders: Phil Collins - "Sussudio"
summary: Add Phil Collins - "Sussudio" to your library!Take a nonsense word, a horn section and the heavy funk influence of “1999” by Prince, this mid-80s Phil Collins song about a schoolboy crush will leave you wanting to just say the word “Sussudio”!

name: Systematic Corruption
summary: Systematic Corruption is a medium-sized e1-themed techbase.

name: Synapse
summary: 「Synapse」is a game based on cooperative play with horror and thrills. Players must cooperate in a dark space to avoid robots, hack into facilities, and escape. The only thing players are given is a sense of helplessness and fear of death.

name: Syberia: The World Before - 20 Years Edition
Synthetic Soul 2
summary: Synthetic Soul 2 is an immersive modern life sim with an in-depth robot companion. Discover the wealth of Industry and change everything.

name: System Shock
summary: A seminal cyberpunk first-person exploratory adventure game with RPG elements in which, waking up in the Citadel Space Station, a lone hacker has to survive corrupted enemies and collect audio logs and equipment from former station workers in order to shut down SHODAN, the station's artificial intelligence that has killed everyone on board and now intends to destroy the world.

name: Sylvania Families: Fashion Designer ni Naritai! Kurumi Risu no Onna no Ko
summary: Sylvania Families: Fashion Designer ni Naritai! Kurumi Risu no Onna no Ko is a Role-Playing game, published by Epoch, which was released in Japan in 2004.

name: Sylvie
summary: You're part of an evil-hunting squad, but recently your partner has gone missing while out on a contract. This is a very short platformer where you hack and slash your way through a cult hideout and face a challenging rival.

name: Sylvanian Families 2: Irozuku Mori no Fantasy
summary:
The sequel to Otogi no Kuni no Pendant.

You play as a girl from the Ivory Rabbit family, embarking on an adventure to restore the "colors" that have vanished from the fairy tale world.

name: System Purge: Hollow Point
summary: Faced with a horrifying tragedy, you must delve into a flowering realm of memories and nightmares to save your dead lover. SYSTEM PURGE - Hollow Point is a massive expansion which adds a surreal new campaign, challenging new gamemodes, and more.

name: Symphony Worlds
summary: Symphony Worlds is a top-down shooter where the levels are generated by the players' music library.

name: Syphon Filter: Dark Mirror
summary: A port of Syphon Filter: Dark Mirror, originally released on the PlayStation Portable system, featuring optimised rendering, rewind, quick saving, and custom video filters.

name: Systematic Immunity
summary: Systematic Immunity is a challenging precision platformer set inside the human body...and not a particularly healthy one either. This body has been infected by a big, nasty bugger of a germ, who is making it his business to spawn many more germs as fast as he can. You and your mob of 20 white blood cells must put a stop to his shenanigans at all costs!

name: Syberia 1 & 2
summary: This version includes two complete games: Syberia and Syberia 2.

name: Syphon Filter: Combat Ops
summary:
Syphon Filter: Combat Ops is an online-only game for the PSP. Though it is almost identical to Syphon Filter: Logan's Shadow, the unique feature of map editing sets this title apart.

Offline as of June 27, 2012.

name: Sylvanian Families: Otogi no Kuni no Pendant
summary:
An ivory rabbit called Aster Dandelion ventures into the heart of the forest during a picnic and aids an injured fairy. She is left with a magical pendant that has a mysterious power that turns reality into dreams at the stroke of six in the evening. Now Aster has a quest to return the pendant to Fairyland while she tries to carry on with her daily life.

In Sylvanian Families: Otogi no Kuni no Pendant the player navigates Aster around Sylvania Village, talking to her acquaintances, interacting with objects and completing various tasks, whether she’s at home, school or at a friend’s house. Various mini-games must be won to earn seeds for growing flowers as well as furniture to decorate Aster’s bedroom. There’s also optional side quests such as sprinkling vividust on wilted flowers.

name: System Shooterz
summary: A top-down arena shooter in space where every decision you make can lead to victory...or crushing defeat! Make every shot, rocket thrust, and planet orbit count! Destroy the enemy motherships circling the system in deep space before their drones overwhelm you and exhaust your ship's resources.

name: Syvalion
summary: Syvalion is an arcade shooter video game released by Taito in 1988 and designed by Fukio Mitsuji, creator of Bubble Bobble. The player controls a golden metal dragon which flies around, breathing fire at its enemies while collecting power-ups to recharge its fire. The enemies are robots and tanks. At the end of each level, the player fights a boss.

name: Symbiocom
summary: The protagonist of this game is a maintenance engineer aboard I.S.T. Rident, a space-faring passenger liner in the delta quadrant. Suddenly, two war ships attack Rident. As the captain orders the passengers to escape on life boats, the hero is knocked unconscious. Some time later, he finds himself in a deserted spacecraft, and must find a way to escape from there, find out who was responsible for the attack on Rident, and what has happened to its passengers.

name: Synchrom
summary:
Synchrom is an immersive musical journey where you play with your own cognitive abilities.

Take control of a Synchrom, a mysterious device that can channel the pulses of light energy, sharpen your senses and show precision to defeat your opponents.

name: System Critical II
summary: System Critical II is bigger & badder than ever before! Get ready to experience a platformer shooter like no other in VR. Blast your arm cannon and use guns, melee weapons, grenades,& shields to make your way through the carefully crafted levels with epic boss battles and tons of enemies to kill.

name: Syren
summary: Syren is an intense survival horror game in which you must use your wits to navigate through a labyrinthine underwater base. In episode 1, you must use stealth, and solve puzzles to survive, while in episode 2, you must blast your way through the deadly swarm of syrens stalking you.

name: Syberia 3: An Automaton with a Plan
summary: Discover "An Automaton with a Plan", a new adventure that takes place in the enchanted world of Syberia 3! Play as Oscar, the famous automat, and unravel the mystery of Kate Walker's disappearance!

name: Synchronica
summary:
Synchronica is an arcade rythm and music game.
The cabinet is build with 2 touch screen and the goal is to touch circles on the screen and the player must touch them at the right moment.
This is a 2 players game, the partners must be synchronised to complete game missions.

name: Sydney 2000
summary: An unreleased Game Boy Color port of the Sydney 2000 Olympics game.

name: Symptoms of Deceit
summary:
You've been working at the Willani Epidemiology Lab as a secretary for around a year now. The researchers appreciate you, but they're not allowed to share the confidential details of their work with you.

Things are going well until your coworkers begin acting strange and you hear rumors of the lab performing unethical experiments. As your coworkers dodge your questions, you meet a new neighbor who seems a little too eager to insert himself into your life.

name: Sybil is Haunted
summary: Sybil has a very scrambled mind. Some days she just needs you to push her along. Help Sybil navigate the horrors of her bedroom and see what adventures await. Find every ending to see what lays in her future. HYIPHYOP

name: Synth Beasts
summary: Capture and harness powerful beasts to do combat and traverse the world in this monster taming action-adventure. Unravel the mystery of your existence by exploring a sinister island laboratory and putting an end to the creation of the Synth Beasts.

name: Symbiotic Overload
summary: The age of machines ruling the world happened long ago. The remaining human resistance is spread around the world in small colonies barely hanging on to survival. With the end of an age in sight, a recon team has captured one of the droid foot soldiers and provided valuable research materials for their scientists. This discovery could change the fate of mankind, a program that enables the control of one of the machines top foot soldiers.

name: Symbol Games Horror Bundle
summary: Welcome to the Symbol Games Horror Bundle! This features four different games of varying types, ranging from exploration, questioning, modern store tasks, and making games with issues to fix. These games can and will pull out-of-game scares (that won't actually damage your system).

name: Syphon Filter 3
summary:
A port of Syphon Filter 3, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

Missions include stealth, assassination and all-out combat, plus a wide range of mini-games, including evasion, retrieval and demolition.

name: Syobon Action Nostalg
summary: Syobon Action Nostalg is a reboot (not a remake) of the rage game named Syobon Action/Cat Mario. This game is done for those players who likes some fair challenge (and specially more for the Syobon fans).

name: Synthcart
summary: The Synthcart is a rather unique title for the 2600 that allows you to play music using a pair of keyboard controllers. Each keyboard controller controls one of the two oscillators in the Atari 2600.
